Salai Lungthli Tum, 2010 thimnak ah Chin party nih Pyine MP 18 lakah 10 bak an ngah khawh, USDP nih MP 7 lawng an ngah i ENDP nih 1 an ngah. NLD le Zomi party an lut lo.Chin party nih tukum thimnak ah 2010 tluk in teinak an hmu khawhnak lam a um bak lo timi cu a lungfimmi poah nih theih dih a si ko.
Atu ah ‘kanmah caan a si cang’ an ti than. 2010 ah cakei a tengh lai bang mipi ruahchannak sang tuk an rak pek hna, mipi zong nih an zumh ve hna i vote rak pek cio a si. Teinak zong an hmuh nain zei pipa an tuah khawhmi a um hlei lo.Cucaah, ‘cakei ka tlaih lai’ tiah a chimtu poahpoah kha zumh awk an si lo, cakei tlaih ngam ding ah chizawh tal a tlai balmi a si maw timi an tuanbia zoh hmasa a hau.
Mipi caah ‘ka caan dihlak pek in rian ka tuan lai’ tiah a chimtu poah kha zumh awk an si lo, mipi caah lakphak hrai khat tal a pe siang balmi a si maw timi an tuanbia kha zoh hmasa a hau.Chin timi min an zuar ruang menmen ah Chin miphun an dawt khun tinak a si hlei lo, miphun le ram thancho nak caah zeibantuk rian dah a tuan bal timi an tuanbia zoh a hau, tuu phaw aa aihmi sahrang an um theu tawn.
A ngaingai ti ah cun Chin miphun dawt lei ah cun Chin party candidate nih Dr. Hmuh Thang an tluk bak lai lo. Miphun min an zuar ruang menmen ah miphun a daw bik bantuk an i ruah khi an ningzah awk ngai a si.
Ref: Salai Lungthli Tum.

Myauk U Peng Sianginn Pakhat Ah Siangakchia Minung 10 Hrawng Thaw Chuah Kho Loin An Um Caah Sizung An Phan. Rakhine ramkulh, Myauk U peng Kwaytae (ကျွဲတဲ) khua siangsangrun ah November 23, zinglei ah nu siangakchia 10 hrawng cu hmakhat te ah thaw chuah kho loin an um tiah theih a si.
November 23, zinglei sianginn an kai lio ah Grade 9 siangakchia pakhat cu thaw chuah kho loin a um, cu tlawmpal ah midang siangakchia minung 10 hrawng zong thaw chuah kho loin an um, a thaw a pit mi chung ah lung zawtnak a ngeimi hna le sizung in a chuak ka mi zong an i tel tiah Kwaytae (ကျွဲတဲ) siangsangrun sianginn cachim pakhat nih a chim.
Thaw chuah kho lo le thaw zat loin a um i a damlo mi siangakchia hna cu Myaung sizung ah an thlopbul hna i oxygen an pek hna tiah a chim chap. Kwaytae (ကျွဲတဲ) siangsangrun sianginn ah a tubantuk in thil a can caah caan karlak chung cu sianginn kharchung a si lai tiah theih a si.Crd:TCP

Sawrkar hna thawk pension rawih nawn tumna awm a tawp thlenga dodal MZP-in rel
W. Lungdar Middle School buaina chungchanga MZP Sub-headquarters, W. Lungdar hmalakna thlawp
Aizawl | July 22, 2022: Vawiin Ni 22, July 2022 (Zirtawpni) Chhun dar 12:00 hian MZP General Headquarters Executive Meeting neih a ni a. Meeting ah hian Pension rawih nawn chungchang leh W. Lungdar Middle School chungchang te rel a ni. Meeting hi Pu Lalnunmawia Pautu, President in a kaihruai a ni.
Meeting chuan tun hnaia Coope
... 
ension tawh rawih nawn tumna a awm chu a hrethiam lo hle a. MZP chuan pension rawih nawn hi a rem ti lo a, a dinna ngaiah ala ding reng a ni. Pension ruai nawn lo tur hian thuneitute hnenah ngenna thlen a ni tawh a, MZP ngenna in awmzia a nei lo a, pension rawih nawn tumna a awm hi a tawp thleng dodal turin hmalak nise tiin meeting chuan a rel a ni.
MZP chuan W. Lungdar Middle School buaina chungchang an ngaihtuah a, hemi chungchanga MZP Sub-headquarters, W. Lungdar hmalak tawhna, School buildin
...
t a lo nih tawh dan te, zirlaite himna tura hma an lo lak tawhnate chu ṭha a tiin thlawp zel nise tiin a rel a. MZP chu zirlaite tana ding a nih angin kan ramah zirnain hma a sawn theih nan a ṭul anga hmalak zel nise tih a ni.
MZP chuan tunhnaia MZU hnuaia Degree course hrang hrang result chhuaka, hlawhtlinna chang MZP chhungkua, College SU leh Hnampual zirlai pawl hruaitute lawmpuina, hun remchang hmasa berah hman nise tiin a rel bawk.

Trump bantuk President pasal ttha le USA mipi a dawttu hi cu an um ti lai lo ti kho si. USA President Donald Trump hi cu ti sawhsawh ding a si lo ti a fiang thluamah cang ko. TV le Media ah fakpi in an soisel an phomh hnuah a soisel tu le aphomhtu lilah ningzak thanchiat in an um ko.
Coronavirus ruangah US cu a buai tak tak cang i, Great Depression hnuah atu bantuk in USA hi a buai bal lo, Atu Coronavirus ruangah USA a buai ning hi cu mithiam pawl nih an chim ning ah cun hnunglei ah kir tthan ba
... 
on, We don’t have Kings) tiin America reopening dingmi kongah President nih amah lawngin rian attuan awk a si lo tiin fakpi in an soisel
NYC Andrew Cuomo nih President Trump cu hruhnak phun khat ‘schizophrenic’ tiin CNN ah fakpi in a phomh. President Trump nih amah duh ning bantuk tein America reopening tuah a tim ah cun Court ah doh a tim. Boruak a sang tak tak, mah bantuk in USA ram hruaitu an buai lio ah mipi hna cu ni fatin an thi thluamah, natein President Trump nih cun tilawng haotu bantuk
...
h kan chuahpilai an ti. President Trump bia chim mi “”Tell the Democrat Governors that “Mutiny On The Bounty” was one of my all time favorite movies. A good old fashioned mutiny every now and then is an exciting and invigorating thing to watch, especially when the mutineers need so much from the Captain.”

Sakhi chikhat Blackbuck a kah avanga kum 20 zet thubuai nei tawh, he thubuai avanga tunhnaia man a nih hnua bail-a chhuak mek, Film star lar Salman Khan chu ram pawna a zin chhuah phalsak a ni tih court in vawiin khan a puang. Jodhpur District and Sessions Court-a roreltu Chandra Kumar Songara chuan Salman khana’n May ni 25 leh July ni 10 inkara US, Canada leh Nepal ah te zin a dilna chu a phalsak a ni. Kum 52 mi Salman Khan hi kum 1998 ah Blackbuck pahnih a kahhlum avangin kum 5 tang tura a chungthu rel a ni a, Jodhpur Jail ah zan hnih a riah hnuah April ni 7 khan Bail in a chhuak a, hei hi jail a tan \um 4-na a ni. Kum 1998, 2006 leh 2007 ah te khan Salman khan hi Jail ah a lo lut tawh a, a vaiin ni 20 a tang tawh a ni. Bail-a chhuahtirtu Judge Ravindra Kumar Joshi chuan court phalna la hmasa lova ram chhung a chhuahsan a khap a ni. A thubuai hi May ni 7 ah ngaihtuah leh tur a ni.

Y20 intawhkhawm tum 5-na PUC-ah hman a ni
India in G-20 President hnihna a chelh mek laia programme hrang hrang siam zinga thalai te tinzawna programme siam, Y20 Meet on Nationalism, Patriotism and Development intawhkhawmna chu nimin khan a tum 5-na atan Pachhunga College University (PUC)-ah neih a ni.
Nimin a PUC-a hun hman hi Sports Minister Robert Romawia Royte chuan khuallian nia hmanpuiin ram leh hnam hmangaihna rilru thalai te zinga tuh leh put a pawimawh thu leh a tulna te sawiin, mahni ram leh hnam ngaihsanna chang hre lova hmangaihna nei lova, nationalism thinlung kan neih loh chuan hnam a boral thei a ni, a ti a. Ram ropui tih Europe khawmual ram thenkhatte chanchin sawiin, hnam-ah an chiang ah, nationalism rilru an neih avangin an ramte a hmasawnin a changkang a, hnam ngaihsanawm leh ropui an nihna chhan chu ram leh hnam hmangaiha an neih vang a ni, a ti a. Manipur buaina chungchang sawiin, hnam khat kan nihna in inphuar-khawm a, an tawrhna kha kan tawrhna a ni a, he thil thleng hian hnam anga kan inpumkhatna hi a sawh nghet niin a sawi bawk.Nimin-a Y20 Meet-ah hian MZP Adviser Lalnuntawma Fanai chuan thupui sawihawnna neiin thupui sawizauna, a bikin Zo hnahthlak te tana nationalism pawimawh dan Prof. J. Doungel in a sawi a. ICT Department-a Informatics Officer C. Lalrinfela leh Social Welfare & Tribal Affairs Department-a MSD&RB atangin Vanlalhruaii ten thalai te tinzawn in presentation an nei bawk a ni.

Vawiina Serchhip Mizofed-a eirawngbawlna gas sem tur lo thleng truck pathumte chu mipuia sem chhuah hma-in chlorine hmanga tihthianghlim a ni.
Serchhip Mizofed-a gas lo thlengte hi nimin lama Borkhola Botling Plant aṭanga rawn chhuak an ni a, tukinah Serchhip rawn thlengin, ramri leh check gate-a tihdin leh tihkhawtlai an ni lo nia hriat a nih avangin tunlaia khawvel puma hri leng mek, Covid-19 laka mipuite an himna tur atan Serchhip District Consumer Association ruahmanna-in Chlorine hmanga tih
... 
a ni a, a tihthianghlimna Chlorine hi PHE Department-in tumin, Fire & Emergency Department-ten an kangṭhelh motor hmangin an phuhfai a ni.
Tun ṭuma gas lo thlengte hi Serchhip Bazar, Serchhip Chhim Veng leh Keiṭuma sem tur an ni a, Serchhip Mizofed chuan tun dinhmunah eirawngbawlna gas-ah harsatna a awm an rin loh thu an sawi a ni.
Covid-19 leng mek vanga sawrkar laipuiin PMUY hnuaia eirawngbawlna gas connection neite tana thla 3 chhung a thlawna gas dawng tur hi Serchhip Mizofed hnuaiah chhungk
...
g zinga 192 hi Serchhip town area chhunga mi niin, heng mite account-ah hian eirawngbawlna gas man thun a ni tawh a, bank account felloh vaga pawisa la thunsak theih loh an la awm bawk a, heng mite hian sum an dawn ngei theih nan Supply Chain Committee-ten hma an la mek a, gas a thlawna dawngtu turte hian online/sms hmanga booking an tih a ngai a, hemi kawnga harsatna nei leh zawhfiah duh nei chuan Mizofed, Serchhip Office emaw, District Consumer Association hruaitute hnenah zawhfiah theih a ni.

Vawiin hian Serchhip DC Conference Hall ah National Voters’ Day vawi 7 na hman a ni a, District Election Officer leh Bawrhsap ni bawk Dr. Lalrozama, IAS chu khuallian a ni.
Dr. Lalrozama chuan, zalenna awm lohna leh tihluihna hmanga rorelna ram hrehawmzia hrechiangtuten, zalen taka mipuiten ram hruaitu an thlanna rama chen an chak thin a, an nunna thapin zalenna ram panin an lo tlanchhe fo tawh thin. Vawiina National Voters’ Day vawi 7 na lo thlen hian, ram hruaitu atana duh thlang thei kan nihn
... 
ha leh felfai tak kan neih theihna tura thawktute zawng zawng chungah lawmthu a sawi bawk.
Voters’ Day hmannaah hian Serchhip District chhunga Assembly Constituency pathuma Booth Level Officer ti tha zual (Best BLO) hnenah Dr. Lalrozama hian lawmman, Citation leh Rs 3000 theuh hlanna a nei nghal bawk a. Hrangturzo Constituency atangin Pu VL Rinsanga, Lungkawlh BLO, Tuikum Constituency atangin Pi K. Lalthazuali, Chhingchhip I BLO leh Serchhip Constituency atangin Pu F. Ramdinpuia, Serchhip 9 BLO 
...
ualna neih a ni a, Voters’ Day puala Chief Election Commissioner of India Pu Nasim Zaidi thuchah chu Projector hmanga en ho a ni bawk.
National Voters’ Day hmanna hun hi Election Officer Pu R. Vanrengpuia, MCS, Serchhip SDO Sadaar ni bawk chuan a kaihruaia, hun hman zawhah EPIC thar lachhuak duh apiangte tana lakchhuahna hun siam nghal a ni.
National Voters’ Day, 2017 hi Serchhip District chhung hmun dang, Thenzawl ah leh N. Vanlaiphaiah te pawh hman a ni bawk.

Hunpui lo thleng tura halpuah leh halmawi hrang hrangte khap dan tur chungchang relin tun hnai khan home minister hovin thutkhawm a ni a. Hunpui Krismas leh kumthar thlen nan ni 105, thla thum zen zawn a la awm a, tun atanga hmalak dan tur rel a, chet lak nghal a nih chuan, state pawn atanga halpuah-halmawi lo lut tur pawh a tam zawk chu dan chah hman a beisei theih awm e.
Hunpui laia halpuah/halmawi khapna thupek hi sawrkarin puang kum tinin, YMA nen te pawh ngawrh taka hmalak ni thin mah se, z
... 
lo thin hle. Nikum kumhlui thlah zan phei kha chu tunhma zawng aiin halpuah/halmawi a hluar niin a lang.
Hmalak dan tur hma taka lo rel lawk hian awmzia thui tak a nei turah ngai ila. Tun atanga halpuah/halmawi lo lut tur lo dan hi thil tha tak a nih rualin, a pawimawh ber zawka chu, halpuah/halmawi hi lo lut tehreng pawh ni se, a ruka zuartute awmin a ruka lo lei pawh awm mah se, a ruka hal lehzel chu thil theih loh a ni a, halpuah leh halmawi chu hmuh hmaih leh a ri hriat hmaih chi a ni lo.
Ku
...
, Police leh YMA tang hova foot/mobile patrolling neih tur a ni a. Hetah hian YMA branch hrang hrangte hi mahni branch lo theuhah duty ta se, chu chuan awmzia thui tak a neih theih a rinawm.
Traffic rule tha taka zawm thei, silent city tia sawi hlawh thei Mizote hian, krismas zan pawh hi hlaa ‘silent night’ ti satliah mai lova, a practical-a ti ‘silent night’ turin mi tin kan tanho thiam a pawimawh a, kumhlui thlah zan pawh awmze nei leh changkang zawka hman dan kan rel fuh a pawimawh dawn a ni.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer hnuaiah Manchester United hi an la tha tak tak rih lo niin a lang. Newcastle United lakah result tha tak an hmu a, mahse, UEFA Champions League match Young Boys nen an khelh tumah an che tha lo hle.
Tunah hian Manchester United lamah Ole Gunnar Solkjaer dinhmun a derthawng leh tan niin thuthang a tam hle. Game a enkawl danah Man Utd fans te hrilh a hai deuh niin a lang. Manchester United hian player tha tak tak, talent nei tha an kawl nual a, mahse, coach lam erawh an duhthu
... 
ak a, sum tam tham tak hmanga hralh chhuah an ni.
Kum 51 a upa Erik ten Hag hi Bayern Munich nen pawh sawi zawm alo ni tawh a, tun summer transfer lai pawh khan PL club Tottenham nen sawi zawm alo ni bawk. Van de Beek vang pawhin Old Trafford lam hi a pan duh mai hmel.
3 Brendan Rodgers (Leicester City)
Brendon Rodger pawh hi Manchester United nena sawi zawm ve a ni, kum 2014 khan Liverpool chu Premiere League table-ah pahnihna dinhmun alo hauh pui tawh a ni.
Liverpool a enkawl hnuah Celtic enka
...
hian French midfielder aul Pogba a duh zia alo sawi tawh thin a, Zidane’an Real Madrid a enkawl lai khan, Pogba chu Real Madrid lama lut tur anga sawi a ni. Mahse, a lut thei bik lo. Man Utd coach atan Zidane hi a tha dawn hle.
1 Antonio Conte
Antonio Conte hi Manchester United manager tura rinkai ber pakhat a ni mek. Hlawhtling turin hun a duh rei vak ngai lo. Chelsea leh Inter Milan a enkawl chhung khan a chiang hle. Manchester United hi enkawl ta se a champion pui thei mai a rinawm.

Thuthak Tomkimcing 17 Sep 2014
A. ASEAN Culture Fair (2014) Kibawl ding.
Hongtung ding 2014 October 1 -2 hunsung Yangon Amyotaa Yatyung Hall ah ASEAN Cultural Fair kibawl ding ahihi. Tua mun mah Ngeina lasakna, Ngeina Laam lahna, Silh leh Teen nam tuamtuam lahna om ding ahihi. Ngeina vannam tuamtuam zuak theina 9ftx9ft bial kiim inndei kipia ding hi. Tua man in Zomi te zong kihel huai mahmah banah Ngeina van te namdang mituamtuam in a theihna ding in zuakna lahkhiat na neih huai mahmah ding ahih
... 
r Alan Henning zong khahkhia kik un ci bilbel ah hih man in lamdang kisa liang hi. Mithat a hoihloh na themthem tel ta ci in mu uhhi. Alan Hening pen Britain gam mi hi in nidang in taxi hawl tawh innkuan neek zong ahihi. Tu in azi le ta tetawh Syria gam om Galtaite donghu panpih ding in akitawi khia in akuan khia innkuan te ahi uhi.
C. Google in Ahawl omlo Drone vanleng tawh Internet hawm ding.
Google in abeisa hun in huihlak ah hunsau veipi aleng thei Drone vanleng te bawl Titan Aerospace leikh
...
.Euromoney Myanmar Global Investment Forum
Nay Pyi Taw khuapi ah Euromoney Institutional Investor (Asia) tawh kipawl in Myanmar Global Investment Forum Myanmar International Convention Center –MICC 2) hall ah 2014 Sep 17 in thupitak in bawl uhhi. Euromoney Institutional Investor (Asia) pan Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Tony Shale leh apawl te tampi kihel uhhi. Gamsung gampua taangmi palai, Nasep lian nei mihau te, Media thukan te pai uhhi. Mimal 1300 pha uh hi.

Ram pawn a\anga dan bawhchhiaa Assam-a l<tte hriat theihna tur chu tlangzarh a ni ta a, dilna, vbc. 3 leh nuai 29 vel thehluh zinga mi vbc. 1 leh nuai 90 chu khua leh tui dikah pawm an ni a, mi 20,000 vel hnawl an ni a, tunah hian tlangzarh kim loh, endik mek engemawzat an la awm bawk. Registrar General of India chuan a dang tlangzarh leh hun tur chu April thlaa Supreme Court-in kaihhruaina a duan zulzuia tihfel a nih tur thu a sawi. He NRC-a hming chuang zingah ULFA hel pawl hruaitu, Paresh Bar
... 
 a\anga Assam-a l<tte hriat theih an ni dawn a, hei hi kum 1985-a All Assam Students’ Union leh sorkar laipui inremna anga bituk a ni a, kum 1951-a NRC-a chuang tawh, an chhungte nena an inlaichinna finfiah theite leh, kum kum 1971 March ni 25-a Electoral Roll-a chuang tawhte chu NRC tharah hian telh an ni ang. Bangladesh a\anga dan kalha Assam-a mi tam tak, kum tam tak chhunga an luh chungchang hi thil lian tak a tling tawh a, khuahkhirh lohva a awm reng chuan, ram leilung fate aia an tam theih
...
ung fa leh ram dang mi a thliar fel tawh dawn tih a sawi. India leh Bangladesh-in dan bawhchhiate inthawn tawnna thu an thlun loh avangin, heng mite thawn haw dan tur chu la ngaihtuah tur niin Pu Sonowal-a chuan a sawi a, ram dang mite hi hriat chian vek hnuah, an chunga thil tih dan tur chu buaipui zui a ni dawn tih a sawi. Kum 40 deuhthaw, he state-ah hian ram leilung fa leh ram dang mi an inpawlh sawp tawh a, a luhaithlak hle tih sawiin, tunah chuan an inching fel ve dawn ta niin a sawi bawk.

Sui Hlei Tial Ruak I, Tazekhan:Sui Hlei Tial ruak Thantlang khua chung luh pi duh lo in lamkam ah a vuitertu sullam um lo in zaan ah lak than i thlan ah thialtertu Tazekhan hi, hi Thantlang No 3 khuabawipa bak hi a si ti hi a um dan a bia chim bak in thei khawh a si. Khuabawi pakhat nih Sui Hlei tial ruak a rak tlung lio ti hi theih lo in a um hrimhrim la lo.
Cun COVID-19 Committee he zawng hi Sui Hlei Tial ruak kawngah hin an rak i chawn bia cia hrimhrim la cang cucaah Kawl pawl zawng an ral th

Mizoram-a Covid dinhmun leh Covid variant thar 'Omicron' lo thleng thei thlirin nimin khan Health Minister Dr. R. Lalthangliana hovin Health Department-a mi pawimawh te chu an thukhawm.
He thutkhawm Secretariat Conference Hall-a neih ah hian Meeting hmasa lama thurel bawhzui dan te thlirlet a ni a, Contact tracing uluk leh nasa zawk a kalpui chungchang te, Containment Zone puan chungchang te sawiho niin, Central sawrkar atanga Omicron variant hmachhawn dan
... 
dap vat tum a ni.He Meeting-ah hian tunhnaia Health Department-in hlawhtlinna a hmuhte tarlan a ni a. World Bank, NITI Aayog leh Ministry of Health & Family Welfare in kumtin an tihchhuah thin 'Healthy States, Progressive India, Reports on the Ranks of States and Union Territories, Health Index Round IV 2019-2020' kum 2021 kumtawp-a tihchhuah ah chuan State te zingah Mizoram chu pakhatna a ni. Mizoram chu ram pum state te zingah hian Overall leh Incremental ah pakhatna ve ve kan ni bawk.
Univers
...
 hrang hrang zinga 'Wellness Activities' ah lawmman pathumna a la a, Northeast atanga lawmman la thei awmchhun a ni.
Health Minister chuan heng hmalakna hrang hrangah Mizoram in kan titha chu thil lawmawm tak a nih thu tarlangin, thawktu zawng zawng inpekna leh thawhhona vang a nih thu leh theihtawp chhuah zel a tul thu a sawi. Meeting ah hian Minister chuan WHO atanga RT-PCR leh RAgT test kit cheng nuai 400 chuang man Mizoram in a dawng chu lawmawm a tih thu a sawi bawk.

pumpi sungah tua teng tua zah lian mah hong mukhia ta
... 
 (philosopher) Francois-Marie Arouet Voltaire in, “Tu-a kipan kum 50 sungin LST cimang ding hi,”
mawk cih hi.
1694 suak hi a, kum 83 nungta-a, 1777 kumin si hi. PASIAN om lo a cipa, LSTho cimang ding a cipa, a sih khit kum 25
kum, 1802 kum teh Pasian in LUNGDAMNA KHAICI vawhna ah a lim zat mahmah;
The British and Foreign Bible Society [BFBS] piangsak bek dom loin, Voltaire ii leiseek innpi (taih-inn) pen hih BFBSte’
zumpi-in kizang sese lai ta zen hi. A kibungbu tunsak Pasian mah ahi hi.

...
ong kizom ta a, kigawm
kik ding, hanciam ta mah uh leh a khaktan khat om den keii hi.

Topa’ minthanna hi zaw ta hen!

Kum 2020 ah khan Covid-19 pandemic nih vawlei cung a den i economic lei ah chiatnak fakpi a tlung mah lio caan ah millionaire an karh ngai tiah langhter asi.
Mi sifak hna cu an sifak chin i, vawlei cung ah millionaire pawl 5.2 million bak in an karh i, 56.1 million ah an kai tiah Credit Suisse research nih cun a langhter.
Kum 2020 ah khan a vawikhat nak dingah vawlei cung puitling chung in 1% hna cu millionaire an si. Stock market tha than mi le inn man sang nih an rumnak akarh ter.
Pandemic ruangah economy nih chiatnak fakpi a tuar ko natein, mirum hna cung ah cun chiatnak zeihmanh a tlung lem lo.
“Anthony Shorrocks, economist le Global Wealth Report author nih cun Pandemic nih “global market ah caan raulo te lawng rawhral nak a chuahpi” ti chim in, June 2020 hnu cun that lei a panh thluahmah tiah a chim.

=======================================================================================
NLD na dirpi ruang ah Party dang nih biafak le ngaih nuam lo tiang in an i doh lai i an i soisel lai. a caan ah mihrut ti le kawl party, kawl sal an in ti lai. asinain na tha chia hlah, Jesuh nih nun a nem mi cu lunglawm mi an va sidah, Pathian nih an kamh mi hna kha na co lai” tiah Jesuh nih a kan kamh, (Mathai 5:5).
NLD na tanh ruang 
... 

Atu hi Chin Miphun nih kan duh herh mi zauk phung (Federal) uknak a kham tu phunghram zong remh ding in an chuahpi i an nawr cuahmah cang. Tha chiat ding a si lo. Kan pu Aung San nih a biakam kha a fanu Daw Aungsan Suu Kyi le NLD nih tlinter an i zuam ko. Dohkalhtu Party pawl, nihcun a tuah lo ee an ti peng ko lai. dawntu ralkap cu an doh ngam fawn hna lai lo.
NLD doh bak in a nunnak le acaan hman aa tim mi zong an um bantuk in NLD a tanh i federal uknak lei ah lanh thluahmah a duh mi an tampi 
...
wng si loin a doh bak i doh ding. Cheu khat tlang cung Mi Party cu Ralkap ah mahamaih a tuah mi a um. Ralkap kan doh lio ah a thli in a rak i helh mi Party zong a rak um ve hoi.
Mipi sin ahcun zumh awk tlak mi party le Miphun daw bik tu bang an au len nain Ralkap he an rak i helh diam. Cucaah Ralkap uknak phunghram aa naih mi Party pohpoh cu vote pek lo ding.
Mipi kan ria cu, cozah a ser kho mi Party le phunghram rala do i ralkap he mahamaih tuah lo mi Party thiang hlim hi vote peng ko hna usih.

Auto Rickshaw chesualah mi 2 an thi
ZALEN Nov. 28. 2024; Vawiin chawhnu a Lungsen-a Auto Rickshow chesual-ah kum 77 mi leh kum 70 mi an boral.
Thudawn danin, he chetsualnaa thite hi B. Hrangthangpuii (77) leh Thankungi (70) an ni a, an pahnih hian vawiin khan Lungsen North Branch YMA Hall-ah mit an inentir a, an haw lam chu Auto Rickshow-ah hian an chuang a, chawhnu dar 2 vel khan Lungsen-I VC Lungdawh bulah an chesual ta a ni.
B. Hrangthangpuii leh Thankungi hi chetsualna hmunah hian an thi nghal lo a, hliam na tak an tawrh avangin Lungpen PHC-ah lak an ni a, Lunglei lam panpui tum an nih laiin chawhnu dar 3:45 vel khan an boral a ni. Vanduaina tawk a boralte hi in chhungkhat hnai tak an ni.
Rickshaw hi feet 20 bawr emaw chauh a lum nia thudawn niin, a khalhtu chuan hliam na lutuk a tuar lo.

Middle East ram chungah a um mi US cozah ralkap pawl hna cu Russia cozah nih a neih mi a raltuknak vanlawng SU-35 jet nih awlawk chong bak in a tuah hna tiah an chim.American cozah nih ramdang mi hna cawlcangh ning ngiatu ah a hmang mi vanlawng US Navy Spy Plane – P8A Poseidon pi cu Mediterranean Sea rili cungah aa chawk i cu Mediterranean Sea rili cung bak ah cun Russia raltuknak vanlawng SU-35 nih minutes 175 chung bak a zelh tiah an chim.
Cun Russia nih a tu bantuk in US Navy Spy P8A Poseidon vanlawng a ti hram nak hmun hi Mediterranean Sea cung International airspace ti ah an kawh nak cung a phak bak ah a si i,umtu awk thei lo bak in voi thum khengte bak Russia raltuknak vanlawng nih a zelh tiah an chim.
Cun Russian Su-35 jet vanlawng nih US Navy Spy P8A Poseidon a zelh ning cu a kan suh cang rua lai kan ti ah kan pawng kam tein a kal t’han i cak taktak in a kan zelh tiah an chim.Russia nih mah bantuk in US cungah a tuah sermi hi thil pakhat khat Mediterranean Sea veelchum ah tuah mi nei sehlaw a lo fawn tiah an chim.
Cun Russia nih US a ti hram nak hmun hi Internatioanl air-space zawn a si ah US nih Russia cu cikhat ah lehnak vun tuah awk t’ha a si fawn lo.hi thil kongah Middle East ram chungah a um mi US cozah ralkap pawl hna cu an thin a lin ngaingai i bia tak tein an i hrocer pin ah Russia nih zei dah a duh mithil a si tiah dothlatnak an tuah cuahmah tiah an chim.
Source: BBC

Kya-inn Seik Gyi ah PDF pawl ih kaihmi ralhrang Sergeant pakhat cu a tlansuak ih meithal in an kap that, tiah theih a si.
Karen ramkulh, Kya-inn Seik Gyi peng ah PDF pawl in SAC ralhrang sergeant pakhat cu an kai ih hridai ih an ṭawn cingin a tlansuak thotho.
Curuangah PDF pawl cun meithal cerek in nun an sim lawlaw, tiah PDF in an sim.
Bokpyin ralhrang sizung ih hnaṭuan kum 25 mi ralhrang sergeant Taik Htun cu kaih a si ih an ṭawnnak hridai phelh in June 20, zinglam nazi 3 hrawngah a tlansuak. PDF pawl cun an sulhnu zingzoi in hramlak ah an hawl ih an kah that.
“Tualsungmi pawl ih thuthang in simnak vekin kan kai. Kan kaih hnuah hridai in kan ṭawn ih a phelh hnuah a tlansuak. Hramlak ah kan hawl ih kan hmusal. Kan hmuhnak hmunah kan thianfai lawlaw ih kan phum cih,” tiah PDF sungtel mi pakhat cun a rel.
Ralhrang sergeant Taik Htun hi June 18, zinglam nazi 8 ah Kya-inn Seik Gyi khawpi ih thlanglam peng 4 hlatnak Tan Pha Yar khaw kiangah mipi pawl ih simthannak ihsin PDF pawl in an kaihmi a si.
Kya-inn Seik Gyi peng hi KNU ih Do Palaza District Tatmaha (6) luah ram sungah a um.

e hnuaiah Under 18, Under 15 leh Under 13 league kalpui dan tur ruahmanna a nei a, mipa tán mai ni loa hmeichhe tana kalpui dan turte pawh a duang.

Sunando Dhar chuan, "AIFF Youth League kalpui ṭhin hi tunah chuan state thlan bikah an state chhunga kalpui ṭha kan ti a, chumi kalpui tur zingah Mizoram hi a tiṭha thei ber tur z
...
wh a ṭha kan ti a, rah ṭha a chhuah ngei ang tih kan ring," a ti.
MFA Honorary Secretary chuan," AIFF-in in duh ang diak diaka kalpui tur chuan khelmual indaih loh a na dâwn a, tuna kan program neih sate pawh hi khelmual a indaih loh ṭhin avangin kan duh ang thalin lan kalpui thei ṭhin lo. MFA chuan a tam thei ang ber District FA kuta daga, District hrang hranga football hmasawnna tura kalpui dan ruahmanna a siam ang, " tiin AIFF hotute a hrilh.

Champhai, 25th September 2024: Vawiin khan Chief Minister Pu Lalduhoma chuan Champhai Grape Growers Society Winery, Tlangsam, a tlawh a. Society hotute nen inkawmna hun an nei.
Champhai Grape Growers Society hotute hian Chief Minister hnenah hian Grape Wine an tharchhuahte hlawk zawk leh zau zawka an hralh chhuah theih nan sawrkar hmalakpuina an lo ngen a. Grape Wine chu food item a nih anga zalen taka hralh theih an duh thu leh License-Vendor system pawh mumal zawka kalpui an duh thu an lo hrilh a ni.
Pu Lalduhoma chuan Grape Growers Society te chu an Grape leh Wine deh chhuah hralhna kawngah sawrkarin ášhahnem a ngaihpui hle a ni tih hre turin a chah a. An thilsiamte awmze nei leh hlawk zawka an hralh theih nan hma an la dawn a, grape chauh ni lovin thlai dang atanga siamchhuah thilte pawh an ngaihtuah tel dawn tih a hrilh.
Mizoram sawrkar chuan flagship programme - ‘Bana kaih - Hand Holding Policy’ hmangin kuthnathawktute khai chhuah a tum mek a, he policy hnuaia hamášhatna te pawhin an mamawh dan a zirin an dil thei tih a hrilh bawk.
Inkawmna hi Pu HS Vanlalfakzuala, Chairman, Champhai Grape Growers Society chuan a kaihruai a ni.
Chief Minister Pu Lalduhoma hi Champhaiah zan a riak ang a, naktukah Serchhip a pan ang.

Floyd Mayweather-a pa Mayweather Snr chuan a fapa Mayweather leh Manny Pacquiao-te chu a vawi hnih nan an inhnek ngei a rin thu a sawi.
Myaweather chuan video tawi ti chhuakin, Mayweather-Pacquiao rematch chungchang sawi ho tura Saudi Arabia a kal tur thu a sawi tawh a, ngaihven a hlawh nghal hle in combat sports ngainatute chuan an inhnek hun tur an ngaihven nasa nghal hle.
Kum 2015 khan boxer pahnihte hi an lo inhnek tawha, Mayweather hi chakin, mi tam tak mit a tlai tawk lo hle a, rematch hmu chak hi a tam zawk an nih pawh a rinawm viau.
Mayweather leh Pacquiao-te hi an naupang tawh lo ve ve a, a upa zawk Mayweather hi kum 42 niin Pacquiao hi kum 40 a ni ve thung.
Mayweather-a pa chuan TMZ Sports a hrilh danin, “An inhnek leh ngei ka ringa, Pacquiao hian inhnek leh a duh phawt chuan an inhnek leh ngei ka ring a ni,” a ti.
Mayweather Snr chuan a fapa-in Pacquiao chu a hneh leh a ring hle a, a hneh a rin leh rin loh chungchang zawhna chhangin, “Ka fapa hian vawi hnih, vawi thum , vawi li emaw vawi nga pawh intum se a hneh vek ang,” a ti.

Ralkap Council nih Chin ramkulh chung Sipin Zung riantuantu 44 rian in a phuah hna ချင်းပြ ည်နယ်စည်ပင်သာယာရေးအဖွဲ့ရုံးနှင့် ကွပ်ကဲမှုအောက်ရှိ မြို့ နယ်/မြို့ စည်ပင်ဝန်ထမ်း ၄၄ ဦး ကို စကစ က ရာထူးမှ ထုတ်ပယ်
Mindat khua ah suimilaam 24 chung runven mi Uknak Zung pawng, Sipin Quarter an bauh. Thilri man faak zeimaw zat an fir tiah theih a si. မင်းတပ်မြို့တွင် ၂၄ နာရီလုံခြုံရေးအပြည့်ဖြင့် စောင့်ကြပ်ထားသောထွေအုပ်ရုံးနှင့် ကပ်လျက်ရှိသည့် စည်ပင် လိုင်းခန်းအဖောက်ခံရပြီး တန်ဖိုးကြီးပစ္စည်း တစ်ချို့ပါသွားကြောင်းသိရသည်။
Thantlang ah Covid-19 positive minung 17 an hmuhchap. June 29 ah Thantlang Covid-19 Response Committee tuanvo laaknak in Thantlang khua ah Covid-19 zawtnak cheknak an tuah than i minung 17 sin in zawtnak hrik hmuh a si tiah Committee Secretary Pu Ram Khar nih Facebook ah a tial.
Nihin, June 29 hi Thantlang Covid-19 Response Committee nih a voi 5nak an cheknak a si i, minung 41 an chek mi hna chung ah minung 17 sin in zawtnak hrik hmuh a si.Thantlang khua ah June 29 tiang ah Covid-19 zawtnak hrik hmuh mi minung 47 an si cang i minung pakhat a thi cang tiah kan theih.

World Skills Competition-a tel turte thlahna nei
Themthiamna hmanga intihsiakna lian ber, Sanghai, China-a 'World Skills Competition 2022' neih tura India aiawh tur thlanna kal zelah Regional Competition-a tel tur Mizoram thalai 15-te chuan Inrinni khan Mizoram an chhuahsan.
Labour, Employment, Skill Development & Entrepreneurship Department buatsaih, Trade 12 hmanga intihsiakna, State Level Skills Competition-a tithate chu Regional Skill Competition, Patna, Bihar-a neih turah an tel dawn a, he intihsiakna hi tun thla ni 20khian neih tur niin Mizoram aiawh tura thlanchhuah mi 15-te hian Inrinni khan Mizoram an chhuahsan a ni. Mizoram State aiawh turte hi mi 15 niin, Trade 11- Bakery, Beauty Therapy, Hair Dressing, Electrical Installation, Welding, Carpentry, Fashion Technology, Painting & Decoration, Floristry, Hotel Reception leh Plumbing & Heating-ah te an tel dawn a, LESDE Department Officials pali (4) ten an kalpui a ni.Themthiamna hmanga intihsiakna lian ber, India Skills 2021 Regional Competition-ah hian State leh UT 30 atangin mi 1,500 chuang an tel dawn a, Zone 5-ah intihsiakna hi kalpui tur niin, North East leh East Zone bik intihsiakna hi Patna, Bihar-ah nghah a ni.

2001 September 11 lio i ralhrang hna nih New York khua um World Trade Center an hrawhnak hmun pawng ah Muslim pawl nih Islamic center sak ding in an i timhtuah mi cu US president Obama nih August 13 ah a hnatlak pi hna.
Hi hmun ah hin Muslim pawl nih an i pumhnak ding center saknak nawl an ngei ko tiah president Obama nih a ti. Cun hi ram ah miphun, biaknak thleidan lo in umnak, cawlcanghnak nawl pek a si. Muslim pawl zong nih an biaknak kong ah nawl an ngei tiah a ti.
CNN thawnghlat nih mipi sin thawng an laknak bia a let mi hna 70% tluk nih cun khi hmun ah Islamic center sak ding cu an duh lo. Minung 500 tlum innkhan, lentecelhnak khan, lemcanghnak khan, rawldawr tibantuk a telmi USD 100 million dih dingin sak timh cu cu hmun pawng i ralhrang ruangah minung 3000 tluk a thi mi hna upat pek lo a lo lai tiah an ti.

Zan chhawrthla engriai hnuaiah,
Ti hian ka dawn thin che;

Ka van malsawmna i ni tih reng i hre silo maw,
I hlu chuang ngei e ka tan hian;
Bawihte, ka dawn lungruk i luahkhat zo ngei e,
Nang chhingzo tur reng an awm lo.
Nang ang lunghlu chhar tur hian,
Hringnun mual tin ka lo zawh maw;
Thlaler ram ro te leh tuipui zau tak te khan,
I tangnem min hruai thleng si,
Ka hmangaih reng ang che, ka vuan reng ang che;
Tunah leh kumkhua in.
Awmkhua harin tlaini ka lo thlah liam thin a,
Mahse, tunah a dang zo ta;
Ka damchhan ka beiseina, ka duhaisam i ni,
Nangmah vang hian hringnun a mawi;
Bawihte, ka dawn lungruk i luahkhat zo ngei e,
Nang chhing zo tur reng an awm lo.
Riahrun vai ka thinlung tan hian,
Runlum min pe a, ka engkim i ni;
Hmangaihna in lawina run ti mawi reng se,
Lungchim te in leng zel ang,
Chung Pathianin min hruai zel se.

Hmasawnna ṭangkai lo ber zinga mi chu a ni teh meuh mai. India ram khawpui New Delhi a Nizamuddin a Muslim sakhaw vuantu Tablighi Jamaat te punkhawmna chuan India ram chu dinhmun derthawng tak ah a dintir mek a ni.
He Muslim punkhawmna ah hian kan ram ṭhenawm Assam aṭanga kal zinga mi 4 te chuan Covid19 hi an Positive thu Assam Health Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma chuan vawiin khan a puang.
Heti hian Positive hmuhchhuah hmasak ber kum 52 mi te nen Assam hian Positive 5 a nei ta. Kum 52 a upa positive hmuhchhuah hmasa ber hi Silchar Medical College ah enkawl a ni a, a dinhmun a ṭha zel niin an sawi. Positive hmuhchhuah thar mi 4 te hi Guahati Medical College ah dah niin kum 19 aṭang kum 60 a upa te an ni.
Assam Health Minister chuan Assam aṭang Tablighi Jamaat Event ah hian hriat theih chinah mi 456 te chu an kal thu a sawi. Assam dinhmun pawh a ngaihṭhat thlak tawh loh hle a, Positive hi la belh thei dinhmun ah an ding mek.
Tablighi Jamaat inkhawmna ah hian India ram chu dinhmun derthawng tak ah a dintir a, chhimtu hi India ram chhung chauh nilo ram dang aṭang an tel bawk.
India ram hi khawvel a mihring bitna lam ah pahnihna a ni a, khawvel Media te pawh in a ruka an thlithlai lai mek reng a ni bawk. Tablighi Jamaat Event a tel zingah haw nghal lova zinkual awm vang te in engzat nge kai awm belh anga an putdarh ang tih hi a sawi theih loh.Tablighi Jamaat punkhawmna hian India chu Covid19 Positive ah hmasawmna duhawm lo a neih phah ngei a rinawm hle a ni.

Hyderabad ramsung ah thil rapthlak zet a thleng. Innsang nu pakhat in thikthu siatnak ruangah nunau pakhat a kaihrem ih misual pawl a pawngsualter.
Misual 5 cu sumpai thawn a ruai, an pawngsual lai cu video in arak zuk hnuah ‘na relsuak asilen online parah na video hi ka pholang ding’ tin a hringhro. Gayatri tei nupa le tuahmawh tong nunau cu vengkhat ih um an si.
A pasal le vengsung ih um nunau cu hnaṭuannak thuhla ah an hmeltheih aw. Gayatri hi a harhdamnak a ṭha lo ih kilkhawi a ṭul ringring. Curuangah an vengsung ih um nunau cu Gayatri kilkhawitu dingah an ruai.
October 2021 ihsin February 2022 tiang an umtlang khawm, cutawk ah a pasal ih amah tuamhlawmtu nunau cu a rinhlel. Buainak an nei rero. Cumi hnuah Gayatri in an vengsung ih um nunau cu thuhla reltlang dingin a ko, room pakhat sungah a lutpi ih cutawk khan sungah misual 5 an rak umcia.
Hridai thawn an tawnbet hnuah an sualpi ciamco, Gayatri in a phone in arak zuk bet. Cumi hnuah an sualpi mi cu hliamhma a tuar ruangah siizung ah ava feh ih siibawi pawlin an tuamhlawm, palik hnenah thubuai a thehlut ih misual 5 le Gayatri cu an kai.

Hmailei kan fa le nih Norway ram lawng si lo in Vawlei cung ah minthang le Bawi nganngan an si te lai nak kong le Siibawi thatha an chuah te lai nak kong a chim. Pathian nih thluachuah tampi pek a kan duh i a thluachuah dawng thiam hna u sih a ti. Bawipa min Thangthat si ko seh.

Mon pyine Thathon myo le Bilin khuapi karlak Yangon-Mawlamyian lampi le a pawngkam ah ni 13 chungah kahdohnak voi 10 a chuak I mah kahdohnak ahcun ralhrang lei 20 renglo an thi I mipi ralkap lei PDF 4 nih ram le miphun caah nunnak an pek tiah Tapinshwehti sitcawng sinin thawngtheih asi.
July ni 24 in August ni 6 tiang Thathon myo le Bilin khuapi karlak Yangon-Mawlamyian lampi cungah a ummi Cungaih hlei a rannak in remh khawh dingin Thathon district chung ummi ralhrang tatmah 44 tang ummi tatyin hna le BGF tatyin hna I komh in tam taktak in sitcawng an chuak I ni 13 chung ah kahdohnak voi 10 a chuak I mah kahdohnak ahcun ralhrang lei in 20 renglo an thi cang I tampi nih hliam an tuar caah hnu an kir than tiah theih asi.
Hi a cunglei langhter mi ralhrang hna cu KNU Thathon district, tatmaha 1, tatyin 2, KNLA tatkhuai hna, KNLA/PDF bukomh Tapin shwehti sitcawng, Tawgyikan sitcawng, pahkahphah, Drone Team, Sniper Team hna I komh in an dohmi hna asi I, KNLA/PDF bukomh phu in ralkap 4 nih nunnak an pek I 5 tluk nih faaktuk lo in hliam an tuar tiah theih asi fawn.
Ralhrang hna nih thazaang tampi hmangin sitcawng an chuak than I Shweyaungpiah khua, Awingyi khua, Khalohin khua, Marankung khua, chaungsoh khua, mihchaung khua hna ah a ummi mipi inn le lo an hrawh I thilri hna cu an fir piak hna I khuami zong an thah hna I human right biatak tein an buar caah KNLA/PDf bukomh ralkap nih cun pehzulh in kan doh peng rih hna lai tiah Tapin Shwehti sitcawng nih an chim.

SAC Ralkap Nih Hakha Le Nipi Karah Nu Pakhat An Kah Thah!
Nihin August 12 ah Hakha le Nipi kar lampi ah khualtlawng motor pakhat cu SAC ralkap an kah caah motor chung ummi nu pakhat a nunnak a liam, tiah theih a si.
Min langhter a duh lomi pakhat nih, “Khualtlawng motor cu kaphnih an i kahnak karlak ah an um. SAC ralkap nih naih tuk in motor cu an kah caah nu pakhat a nunak a liam. Motor thlalang zong a kuai dih,” tiah The Chin Post ah a chim.
Khualtlawng mi pakhat nih cun, “Nihin August zinglei ah khualtlawn ding in kan i thawh, ralkap le kan Chin ralkap an i kah caah kal rih hlah u an kan ti. Kahdohnak a daih hnu ah kan lan,” tiah The Chin Post ah a chim ve.
“Nihin August 12 chun hnu ah Timit lei zong in bomb thawng lawngte a thang. Zanlei sang ah Hakha thar hrawng in bomb thawng cu voi 5 leng a thang, Hakha a tlerh dih,” tiah Hakha ummi pakhat nih The Chin Post ah a chim.

Rakhine ramkulh, Maungdaw peng chaklei ah SAC ralkap le AA kar kahdohnak a fah caah, tualchung mipi 800 renglo cu Maungdaw khuachung ah an i dor tiah mi bawmchantu phu hna nih media ah an chim.
Hkamaungsait(ခမောင်းဆိပ်), Yanaungpin(ရန်အောင်ပြင်), Mitait(မီးတိုက်) telh in khua 10 leng in khuami hna cu ralzaam dirhmun an phan i, Maungdaw khuachung phungki sianginn hna le ralzaam sakhan ah dorter an si tiah an chim chap.
“Tukar hrawng cu SAC ralkap le AA kar i kahdohnak cu a fak ngai, SAC ralkap lei nih hriamngan an hman leng ah raltuknak vanlawng hmang in kahdohnak an tuah caah atu bantuk ralzaam dirhmun kan phanh hi a si” tiah tualchung mi pakhat nih a chim. “A liamcia thla chung ah khan a zaam mi cu an um pah cang hna, tukar hrawng cu kahdohnak a fak i SAC ralkap nih hriamngan le raltuknak vanlawng hna an hman caah khua kiangkap ah hriamngan an tla, khuachung ah kan um ngam ti lo caah Maungdaw khuachung ah kan i dornak hi a si. Hmundang ah a zaam mi zong an um ṭhiam, Maungdaw khuachung ah ralzaam dirhmun in a ummi 800 renglo kan si cang” tiah a chim chap tiah theih a si.
Maungdaw peng chaklei ah a luancia July 18 thok in SAC ralkap le AA kar fakngai in kahdohnak a chuak. September 10 ah, Maungdaw peng thlanglei ah ummi SAC ralkap khah-mah-yiah 352 sakhan pakhat cu lakpiak an tong i, ralkap 4 le hriamthil tampi kan lakkhawh tiah AA nih cathanh an rak chuah. Paletwa Sami khuaa Kan chin unaute chu sipai nunrawng ho a vangin Ei tur Thlachhamin mipuiin harsatna an tawk tan.
Chin state Paletwa, Sami khuaa ei leh bar chawk luhna ber kawngpui pahnih a pin tak avangin, Sami khaw chhungah ei tur an tlachham tan tih tualchhung miten an sawi.
Paletwa township, Sami khuaa ei tur chakkhai phur luhna kawng ber Rakhine state Chauhtaw-Sittawe kawng chu Covid inkai darhna nasat avangin, khar a ni a. Kawng dang pakhat Matupi-Mindat-Pakauhku kawng chu inkahna a chhua
... 
deuh reng avangin kal tlang theih a ni lo bawk a.
Tualchhung mi pakhat chuan, “Tunah chuan chaw dawrah pawh chaw a ei theih tawh loh. Buhfai lei tur a awm tawh lo. A chhan chu he kan chakkhai lak luhna kawng vang hi a ni. Miten kawng a ping dawn tih an hriat veleh inchuhin an lei nghal sup sup a, ni hnih khat thil thuah buhfaite chu a zo nghal vek a, thil dang mamawhte pawh kan tlachham tan a, kawng lah chu a ping tlat bawk si a ni,” tiin a sawi.
Sami khaw chhunga ei leh bar lakluhna kawng chu A
...
ust thla tir lam atang khan khar a ni tan a, a awm ang anga inchuha an lei tanna erawh chu August thla tawp lamah a ni a. Tunah hian Paletwa township, Sami khaw chhungah buhfai bag khat sing 40000-80000 vel a ni a, a rate hi chi thum vel a awm bawk a. Thuneitute hnenah mipui mamawh chakkhai lak luh theih dan kawng dapin an dil mek tih hriat a ni.
Sami khuaah hian mipui sing 5 vel an awm a, military council sipaite leh Arakan Army (AA) te inkah avangin mipui 5000 vel chu an raltlan lut bawk a ni.

Senthang peng, Leipi khua ah ram a vai ttimi karlak ah meithal in i kah sualnak a chuah caah kah sual a tongmi pa cu Hakha sizung ah nihin ah an phakpi, tiah thawng kan theih.
Nizan zanlei sml. 6:00 hrawng ah khan Leipi le Lungkhin khua karlak, Leipi in meng 3 hranwg a hlatnak hmun ah Pu Suh Aung (kum 32) le Pu Thanwg Zung Thang telh in minung 4 cu ram an vai.
Ram an vaihnak ah Pu Thanwg Zung Thang nih Pu Suh Aung cu a kah sual. Pu Aung Soe cu amah tein a hliamhma he motorcycle aa cit i Leipi khua ah an vung tlung.
Pu Suh Aung le Pu Thawng Zung Thang hi naihniam cingla-rualchan an si i, facang aah ding in Lei an riah pah ah ram an vai i, atu bantuk in vanchiatnak a chuah sual hi a si.
Hakha palik sakhaan ttuanvo ngeitu palik pakhat nih, “Kah a tongmi hi Pu Suh Aung a si. A kaptu hi Pu Thawng Zung Thang a si i, kah a tongmi a nupi Pi Khin Vang nih case a on. Pu Thawng Zung Thang nih Pu Suh Aung hi a kenglei ah a kah sual. Atu cu Pu Suh Aung cu lungfim in a um cang,” tiah The Chin Journal sin ah a chim.
Meithal in kah sual a tongmi Pu Suh Aung hi Lungkhin khuami a si i, Leipi ah nupi a ngei. Leipi khua ah cun a nupi le an fale pahnih he khua a sami an si.
Meithal in i kah sualnak kong he pehtlai hin Surkhua palik sakhaan ah case on a si i, thil sining fiang in theih awkah palik nih hlathlainak an tuah cuahmah lio a si.

Salai Cung Cung |2018 August 7| Thlantlang peng Horeb tlang ah ni 40 rawl a ulh dih hnu August 7 ah Saya Kyaw Kyaw mual a liam tiah kan theih.
“Saya Kyaw Kyaw hi Tamu ah ummi asi i anupi min ah Iangku ti asi i fapa pakhat a ngei cangmi asi. Anih hi tu ah avoi 2nak rawl a ulhnak asi cang. Kan hnu kum ah khan ni 20 hrawng a ulh cang le tu hi avoi 2nak ni 40 a ulh dih hnu, Horeb tlang ah ni 4 an thlop hnu ah atu bantuk in a thih hi asi. Hi rawl ulh thlacaamnak ah hin amah lawng si lo in a hawi pakhat ni 40 a ulhmi ve a um, cucu Calvary Baptist Church Pastor Tha Peng Lian he ni 40 tiang rawl ulh in Horeb thlacaamnak tlang ah thla an caam” Saya Peter Hram Bik nih The Chinland Post ah chim.
Kyaw Kyaw hi Disciple Group chung ah riantuan lio mi asi. A khua hi Tamu asi i Hakha ah um mi a si. A thihnak a ruang hi, ni 40 chung rawl a ulh dih in inn lei a tlun hnu ah a si. Saya Kyaw Kyaw cu ni 40 hnu ah a rawl ulh thlacaamnak Horeb tlang in a rak chuak i rawl a eimi a thazaang nih a chei ti lo caah August 7 ah tu bantukin a thihnak hi a si tiah kan theih.

YMA Football Tournament khel chhunzawm
Inkhel hmasa berah Serchhip P&E Veng Branch leh Serchhip Chanmari Veng Branch te inhmachhawnin goal hnih ve ve inpe in an inhnehtawk a, Penalty Shootout hmanga chak zawk zawnna neih ah Chanmari Branch YMA te vannei zawkin 4-1 in hnehna an chang a ni. He inkhel ah hian P&E Veng Branch hian Lalnunhlua goal hmanga hma hruaiin Chanmari Branch hian Felix Lalawmpuia goal khung hmangin an sut a, Benjamin Lalruathlua goal hmangin P&E Veng Branch in hma hruai leh mah se Chanmari Branch tan Felix Lalruatsanga chuan a sut ve leh a ni.
Inkhel vawi hnihna ah Serchhip Vengchung Branch ten Serchhip Kawnpui South Branch lehthal in 4-2 in hnehna an chang a, hun chanve hma lamah Serchhip Kawnpui South Branch hian V. Lalremruata leh C. Lalhlimpuia goal hmangin hma hruai mah se Lalpekhlua leh Jerry Laldikkima te goal khung hmanga Vengchung Branch in an sut hnuah Lalruatkima chuan goal hnih khung belhin hnehna an chang a ni.
Inkhel hnuhnung berah Serchhip Chhim Veng Branch ten Hriangtlang Branch chu 7-2 in an hneh a, Chhim Veng Branch tan Lalramliana’n goal hmahruai a khung hnuah C. Lalduhzuala chuan goal hnih khungin Rodinsanga chuan hattrick siamin goal li a khung ve leh a, Hriangtlang Branch tan Lalengliana chuan goal hnih a khung bawk a ni.

Thenzawl Bazar Branch Vs Chhingchhip Venglai Br. (10:00)
S. Kawnpui North Branch Vs Darnam Branch (12:00)
Thenzawl Kanan Branch Vs S. Hmar Veng Branch (2:00)

Mizoram Board of School Education chuan a hnuai ami ang hian raltlan zinga High School leh Higher Secondary School zirlaite tan Mizorama zirna chhunzawm phalsak a nih thu leh hmalak dan tur hriattirna a tichhuak.
MBSE-in hriattirna a tihchhuahah chuan Myanmar ram buaina avanga Mizorama raltlan zingah High School leh Higher Secondary School-ah zirlai eng emaw zat an awm a. Mizoram sorkar remruatna angin heng zirlai raltlante hi Mizoramah zirna chhunzawm phalsak an ni tih a tarlang a.
MBSE dan dinglai angin zirlai zawng zawngin Registration tih vek tur a ni tih tarlangin, Raltlan zirlai nei school-te chu a rang lama hma la tura hriattir an ni a, tuna an raltlanna khua/venga Local Council/Village Council/YMA/YLA/MTP Chairman emaw President emaw hnen aṭangin raltlan an ni ngei tih hriatpuina lehkha thil telin Registration form-te hi MBSE Office, Aizawl-ah emaw MBSE Regional Office, Lunglei-ah emaw Head of Institution kaltlangin thehluh tur a ni a, an zirna tilang thei document awm ang angte thil tel vek tur a ni a. Chutiang nei lote dilna chu a bika ngaihtuah a ni dawn a ni.
Registration dilna form hi November ni 10, 2021 thleng thehluh theih a ni dawn a, hemi hnuah chuan eng dilna mah pawm a ni tawh dawn lo a ni.
Registration fee hi Higher Secondary tan Rs.200 niin, High School tan Rs.100 a ni a, Registration dilna form hi MBSE official website www.mbse.edu.in -ah download theih a ni.

Thluak chungah thi a chuak asiloah thi a kal kho lo (pit) mi zawtnak (Stroke)
********^^*******************************************************************
Minung pum chungah a ummi cells le tissues vialte hi thi le thli (oxygen) tel loin rian tuan kho lo i a nung zong a nung kho fawn lo. Thluak thahri chung ummi titsa fate (nerve cells) nih thi le thli a hmuh/ngah lo ahcun minutes tlawmpal ah a thi kho. Thli cu hnar le kaa lei in a lut i cuap chungah a lut, cun cuap chungah thisen tlang (red bl
... 
ke tu hi asi.
Stroke a chuahtertu a ruang (Causes):
————————————–
• Thikai zawtnak (hypertension or high blood pressure)
• Thi chungah thau phunkhat asi mi cholesterol le lipid tamtuk ruang
• Thluak le hngawng ah artery kua/awngka a si tawnning (normal) nakin a bit deuh ruang (Stenosis zawtnak).
• Artery le vein zawtnak phunkhat asi mi vasculitis
A dangdang stroke he pehtlainak angeimi hna cu:
• Zunthlum zawtnak,
• Kuak zuk
• Thautuk
• Lung zawtnak
• Kaal zawtnak
• Thi zawtnak phunphun
• Cun kum
...
h asi.
Thlawpbulnak (Treatment):
———————————-
Sii hmangin thluak chungah thi a chuak mi cu pitter khawh asi, nain a zual deuh asi ahcun hlai (surgery or operation) tuah a hau. Stroke a chuahtertu zawtnak dangdang zong sii phunphun hmangin thlawp a hau fawn. Hitin tlawp dih hnuah mizaw cu amah sining zoh chih in tha tein aa cawlcang than khawhnak ding le damnak tlamtling a hmuh than khawhnak dingah a phunphun in zoh khenh a hau rih (recovery and rehabilitation).

ST. PETER DAMIAN
Mithiang Peter Damian(Bishop le Bible thiamsang,1007 – 1072) cu Austria khua Bishop a si i Bupi ah Bible thiamsang a simi St. Peter Damian cu 1007 kum, Italy ram, Revina khua ah a rak chuak. A ngakchiat tein a nu le a pa nih an rak thihtak hna caah achuahpi unau hna chungin amah kha sal bantukin tuah i vok hna kha a cawnghter mi a u pa pakhat sinah arak u
... 
mmi Benidict Zateih phungki Sianginn ah a lut i Sianginn uktu Zateih a ṭuan. Thlacamnak, Rianhrang ṭuannak le a thianghlimmi thil hna kha chekhlat cawnnak ah a lung aa pe tawn i a Siangngakchia hna kha lungdaihnak, dawtnak le tangdornak hna a rak cawnpiak hna. 1057 kum ah bawmhnak le ruahnak cheuh a rak orh mi Pope Steven IX nawlngeihnak in Austria le Valletri khua Bishop le Cardinal pakhat a rak si. Kum tlawmpal a rauh hnuah Pope Alexandra sinah zaangfah a rak nawl caah Pope nih Zateih sinak ah
...
 cungtu ahcun aa tlak ningin a um thiammi a si. A ca ṭialmi ah cuticun a rak ṭial, “Ka dawtmi ka nau le hna, nan lungder hlah seh, nan ton liomi hna cu “Sal” pakhat i sifah thabat nak si loin, Nu le pa cawnpiaknak a ingmi ngakchia hna an ton mi bantuk nan tonmi tu a si. Pathian nih minung kha atu chan ah dan a kan pekmi cu, hmaileichan zungzal dantatnak in khamhnak caah a si. Kum 1072 AD ah Faeza khua ah a rak thi i 1828 kum ah Bupi ah Bible thiamsang (doctor) sinak an rak thanh.

Ka siengna lal thisen a'n thawk a nih,
Tisa mi lalnau dinga min thlan suok tu,
A rochan hai chang ve dinga mi thlangtu,
Iengkim siemtu le Lalhai Lal a nih,
Ban kawkal malsawmna changtu ka lo nih.
Varal tieng sawn kona rawl ka hriet,
Ka pa rawl a nih,
Nau tak ka lo nih,
A rohlu tu ding,
A ma angsungah muongten chawlin,
Ka thla a muong a nih.
Chung Jerusalem nu hriet chiengna di'n,
Ka chawl damna ka chunnu a mi lak pek,
Chung tienga ka pa, ka hriet chieng theina di'n,
Kannghalna ka pa nghatsanin ka um,
A ma chau kan nghat na ni di'n a lo rel.
Fahra nina lam thuom min hraw tirin,
Kal chawi dan ka thiem hmain a min chuktir,
Tuorselna din khurah thlakin ka um a,
Huoisenna di'n mal a maksan ka nih,
Ka thatna di'n iengkim a lo rel a nih.
Ka hmu hmaa a rawng ka lo bawl hlak,
Ka pa vana mi hmu kar ka nghak hla ngei,
Nakie pafa in hmu hun la um a ta,
A chun a tanga muangte'n chawl damin,
Ka thlasietna thusim hai lan zawt ka tih.
Words: Ramnunsiem
Tune: LZ Hmar

Kum 2011 kum lang chun Inchen khosah khantou ding dei nan Chehboldan kihil ding tohgon ana kigong pan in, ana ki lo lhing jou poi.
Ahin tu kum 2012 kum in tohgon aki ban jom kit in, March-April-May sung in Tamu khopi (Nanphalong) mun a, Chehboldan kihilna aki bol in lo lhing tah in aki chai tan ahi.
Hiche Chehboldan Kihilna doi tup chu Chehboldan thepa, in leh houin kisah doh thei na ding ti ahi. Tohgon aki gong bang in mi 18 ahungpang in ahi.
Tun a ma ho hi Chehboldan athem tauvin, kho vei teng leh (1) ama ho in kisah na ding hi hen, (2) houin sah na ding hi hen, (3) community hall sah na ding hi hen chule (4) sum hol na ding hi jong leh aki bol thei u ahi tai.
Hicheh “Chehboldan” tohgon lo lhin theina dinga sum le paiya pan la hi hen, tha leh zung chule lung thimsenga pan la ho jouse chunga kipa thu ka hin phong e. Adeh in ahil oiya pu chunga kipa thu aki phong e

Tukin dar 7 vel khan Kolasib leh a chhehvelah thlipui na tak a tleh a, hemi rual hian rial a tl^k bakah ruah nasa takin a sur bawk a, thlipui tleh hian Rengtekawn, New Builum leh Buhchangphai-ah mihring chenna in 17 a tichhia. Kolasib Sub Hqrs. YMA Disaster Management Committee hruaitute hnen a\anga thudawn danin he thli tleh hian Rengtekawnah chenna in 1 luah theih loh khawpa a tihchhiat bakah in dang 10 siam \hat theihin a tichhia a, in chhe siam\hat hna hi vawiin khan hnatlanga thawh a ni. He thlipui tleh hian Rengtekawna BCM Biak In bang tile nasa takin a tichhia a, keyboard leh sound system dangah te pawh ruahtui a lut a, a dinhmun tur hriatchian theih a la ni rih lo a ni. In pakhat chhe vek erawh chu hun remchang dangah sak \hat tum a ni. He thli tleh hian Rengtekawn bula New Builum khuaah pawh chenna in 5 a tichhia a, a tlangpuiin heng in te hi thlipuiin a chung rangva a hawk sak a ni a, vawiin khan hnatlangin a theih dan ang anga siam\hat a ni. Buhchangphaiah pawh he thli tleh hian chenna in pakhat a tichhe vek a, vanduaina tawktu chhungkua te chu Baptist Sunday School hall-ah dah luh an ni a, in sak \hat sak leh dan tur ngaihtuah mek a ni. Kolasib DC Office-a Disaster Manangement & Rehabilitation Branch-a thawkte pawhin in chhia te hi enin an inkhuh hulna atana hman tur silpoulin an pe a, \anpuina dang la pek theih tur pawh ngaihtuahsak an tum nia thudawn a ni.

Assembly 2021 in “Covid 19 hripui a reh theih nan BCM pumpui hian awmni khama tawngtai rual neih ni se”. a tih chu bawhzuiin Administrative Committee chuan May 8, 2021 (Inrinni) hi Covid-19 puala ram pum huap tawngtai programme neih turin a rel ta a. Tawngtai Programme hi a huhova hman theih a nih dawn loh avangin Kohhran chhngkaw tin ten mahni chhungkaw remchan anga hman turin ruahman a ni.
Hemi rual hian Mizoram Kohhran Hruaitute Committee (MKHC) chuan Covid-19 pual leh Myanmar tualchhung buaina chungchang-ah ram puma Kohhran hrang hrang te tawngtai tura a ngenna leh tawngtai thupui an siam te pawh telh nghal a ni bawk.
General Secretary, Rev. F. Ramdinmawia chuan he Tawngtai Programme hi Kohhran chhungkaw tin ten ngaipawimawha zawm theuh turin ngenna a siam a ni.

‘VC/LC-ah MNF-in lawmna tur nei lo’
May 02, 2015
‘VC/LC-ah MNF-in lawmna tur nei lo’
Aizawl: Rorellai Congress party chuan MNF Party chu Village Council leh Local Council result ah lawmna chhan tur an nei lo tiin an party erawh chuan hma an sawn vangin mipuiin Congress ah rinna an la nghat tih a lantir niin an sawi.
MPCC Media Department chuan VC & LC thlan dawnah MNF party chuan zu hmangin mipui nasa takin an fuihpawrh niin an sawi a. MPCC Media Department chairman James Thanghmingmawia chuan, “Zu zawrh hi mipuiin engah vak an ngai lo tih VC leh LC result atang hian a hriat a. Zu hian min tibuai lo thuaiin a rinawm a ni,” a ti. School tan hma chungchangah harsatna siam pawl an la awm chu pawi an ti tak zet tih an sawi a. Sum harsat chhan chu Central in state te hnena sum pek dan a tih danglam vang nia sawiin hmarchhak state 8-a Chief Minister te chuan May thla hian Prime Minister hmuh an tum niin an sawi.
HPC(D) ten tun hnaia mi an lambun thuah a lem (fake encounter) ang leh helte nena inzawm anga puhna chu chhangin Congress chuan hel a thawhpui ngai lo a, MNF te’n an thawhpui zawk niin an sawi bawk.

Mizoram Assembly Session neih mekah Serchhip bialtu MLA, Lalduhoma zawhna chhangin Health Minister Dr. R. Lalthangliana chuan, Serchhip Nursing College (Administrative Cum Teaching block leh Hotel block pakhat) chu May, 2018-ah Construction zawh tawh a nih thu a sawi a. Tui connectin leh Electric connection te tih hmabak ala nih thu leh hmalak mek a nih thu sawiin, Hostel dang pakhat sak mek a nih thu a sawi.
Tun dinhmunah Depatment kuta hlan ala nih loh vangin enkawltu leh vengtu dah a nih loh thu sawi bawkin, peihfel a nih hunah India Nursing Council in hawn phalna a pek chuan hawn theih a nih tur thu leh Teaching Staff leh Non-Teaching Staff thawktu tur ngaihtuah mek a nih thu a sawi bawk.
Member dangte zawh belhna chhangin Health Minister chuan, Central sawrkar in Doctor service kum 65-a alo pawhsei tawh, state tam takin an hman tawh chu Mizoram-ah pawh hmang ve tura ngaihtuahna sengin hmalakna a kal chhoh mek thu a sawi a, Cabinet-a ngaihtuah tura chhawp-chhuah te pawh a la \hat tur thu a sawi bawk.

Kan vawleipi lungrethei le lungfim lo in akan tuah tu Covid-19 pulral zawtnak cu thiang lei panh cu chim lo ram cheukhat ahcun a zual chin lengmang. India ahcun a voi hnih nak Covid-19 pulrai ruangah nikhat ah minung thong thum reng lo an thi i, minung ting thum reng lo zawtnak thar hmuh a si.
Mah lawng hmanh si lo in kan unau Mizo ram zong ah a voi hnihnak Covid-19 zawtnak nih a den cuahmah tthan hna caah ni chiar te in minung tampi zawtnak thar an hmuh. Cun mino tete tisa a tthawng si ling mi zong ah Covid zawtnak ruang ah an thi lengmang.
April 30 tuni ah Nungak Lalruatkimi Aiawl ramhlun sang mi cu Surat, Gujarat ah Covid-19 pulrai ruang ah a nunnak a liam tthan tiah theih a si. Mizo ram biatak te i Covid nih a vun den tthan hna nak a ruang cu kalaram in Mizo ram ah a tlung kal mi hna ruang ah a si.
Mizo ram cu Covid-19 zawtnak lak in kan thiang dengmang cang tiah hna ngam taktak i an um lio ah ruah bak lo in a voi hnih Covid-19 pulrai nih a phanh tthan hna caah tu hi lungrethei vansang au in an um lio pi a si.
Mizei paoh Covid-19 zawtnak in i ralring cio ko hna u sih, ka ttih lo tiah daithlang in ho hmanh um bak hna hlah u sih. Nangmah pakhat ruang ah khan na chungkhar, Na miphun hawi, na khrihfabuu nih mah zawtnak ruang ah harnak chung ah na luhpi khawh hna ti kha philh hrimhrim hlah.

Khawvela hmeichhe kareh zau ber chu Samantha Ramsdell, kum 31, a ni a, a ka hi 6.52 cm a zauin a ang thei a, khawvela hmeichhe kareh zau ber record-ah Guinness World Record chuan an pawm.
Samantha chuan TikTok-ah a âng zau lai videoa post chuan miin an lo hmu a, record a siam an rin thu an hrilh hlawm a, tichuan South Norwalk, Connecticut, USA-ah dentist a pan a, Guinness atangin endiktu an tel tawh a, a theih tawpa zauin a ang ta a, a ân zau theih dan an teh ta a ni. Dr. Elke Cheung chuan digital calipers hmangin Samantha kareh zau zawng hi a teh sak ta a ni.
Samantha chuan, “Ka zahpui thin leh ka awm tinuamlotu ni zawk thin hmanga record ka siam ta mai chu a lawmawm dan a danglam khawp mai,” a a ti.
Samantha hi a naupan lai atanga kareh zau a ni a, an chhungkhat laina hnai zingah ani anga kareh zau an awm ve loh avangin ani chuan danglam bika inhriatna te a neih phah a, naupang dangin a kareh zau avanga chhaih nawmnah an chingte pawh hrehawm a ti hle thin.

Htilin Myomah SAC ralhrang sakhan in polik pakhat cu thla 8.9.2022 ah Gankaw pengkomh tatyin 2/4/10 sin ah pehtlaihnak a tuah hna i hriamnam meithal tlamtling tein CDM a tuah tiah theih a si
Polik pa nih a rak chuah pi mi hriamnam hna cu BA64 pakhat, Kuanbawm pahnih, Kuan 248 hna an si tiah Htilin PDF nih an langhter.
Hriamnam tlangtling te he mipi ralkap sin ah a rak i fonh mi Polik pa cu Htilin Pengkomh tatyin 2,4,10 nih phaisa ting 6000000 laksong ah an thenh tiah theih a si.
SAC ralhrang uknakbka duhlo i nan sin ah ka rak i fonh caah nan unau bantuk in ka zohkhenh uhlaw ka bawm hram ko uh tiah mipi sin aa fonh mi polik pa nih cun a chim. Mipi sin ah aa fonh duhmi nan um ahcun Gankaw pengkomh No.2/4/10 tatyin ah pehtlaih khawh kan si zungzal tiah Htilinn Gankaw pengkomh sin ah pehtlaih khawh kan si zungzal tiah an thanh chih.

Health Minister, Dr. R. Lalthangliana chuan hripui leng karah damlo mamawhte tan leh nunna chhan nan thisen pe chhunzawm zel turin mipuite a sawm.
Thisen pek chungchanga mipuite hnena thuchah a tihchhuah ah Health Minister, Dr. R. Lalthangliana chuan COVID-19 hripui leng karah natna dang avanga damlo tam tak te nunna chhan nan thisen mamawhna chu a la sang em em reng tih sawiin, he hripui len chhunga thisen mamawh tlakchham a awm loh nan theihtawp chhuaha tan kan lak tlan a ngai tak meuh tih a sawi a. Damlo mamawhte tan leh nunna chhan nan he hripui leng karah hian thisen pe zel tura mipuite chu ngenin, Thisen petu turte leh a lo buaipuitu zawng zawng te pawhin he hripui len laia Thisen pek dan tura inkaihhruaina, `Mizoram State Blood Transfusion Council’ in a siam chu zawm hram tur leh COVID-19 laka invenna tura Hmaituamna hman te, Kut fai taka sil fo te, Metre khat aia hnaiah midang awm hnaih loh tur tih hi hre reng turin a chah a. Thisen pek chungchangah Sawrkar hmalakna thawhpui zel leh hemi kawnga hma la tura Association for Voluntary Blood Donor (AVBD) an lo awm chu Mizoram mipui tan a thlamuanthlak hle tih a sawi bawk.

Nizan khan US President Donald Trump chuan North Korea, Venezuela leh Chad ram mite America rama zin khapna thupek, presidential proclamation a tichhuak.
US President hian America khua leh tuite an lo him zawk theihna turin Iran, Libya, Syria, Yemen leh Somalia ram mite America rama zin khapna thupek a lo tichhuak tawh a bawk a ni.
Trump chuan, America himna hi ka ngaih pawimawh ber a ni a, venhimna chungchanga America thawhpui thei lo ramte hi kan ramah lo zin luh ka phal lo tawp a ni, a ti.
White House thuchhuah chuan, North Korea hi kawng eng kimah thawhpui theih an ni lo va, kan rama an lo zin luhna tur hi pakhat te mah a awm lo a ni, a ti a. Chad ram hian firfiak pawl dona kawngah US hnenah thuruk a hriattir duh bawk lo a ni, a ti bawk a, US in sumdawnna kawnga a hrek mek Venezuela sorkar hian a ram mite US tan an hlauhawm em tih chhui chian chungchangah US sorkar a thawhpui duh bawk lo a ni, a ti bawk a ni.
Hetih lai hian Iraq sorkar chuan kawng eng kima US sorkar chu ţha taka a thawhpui avang leh Islamic State dona kawngah an thawhdun avang Iraq ram mite chu America ramah zin an phalsak ta thung a ni.

Katha peng Sagar Gong pengkulh Shwe Pyitha khua fu dum lakah ngakchia kum 4 te a tlaihhrem tupa cu nizaan June ni 7 ahkhan biaceihtu nih sual an phawtnak zoh in biakhiahnak a tuah piak cang.
Zaan video zoh hnu an ttin pah ah kum 4 ngakchia nute cu Aung Ko (kum 31) nih fu dum lakah pial piin a tlaihhrem hnuah a rak thah beh. Aung Ko hi Katha peng biaceihzung nih June ni 7 ahkhan sual an phawtnak bia an caih piak.
Katha peng biaceihtu Daw Myint Myint Thaung nih sual a tuahtu Aung Ko cu nizaan June ni 7 zaanlei pa 4 hrawng ahkhan thih dantatnak pek ding in bia a chah piak. Hibantuk dantatnak an pehzulh peng ahcun kum tlinglo ngakchia tlaihhrem a tam ngainak kawlram ah hi bantuk sual tuahnak a zor deuh lai zong ruahchannak a um.

Dawei-Hteekhee Lam Ah SAC Ralkap Le Sakasaw(ဆာကဆော) Brigade,PDF Phu Fonh Kar Kahdohnak A Chuak.
——————————————————-
Tanintharyi ramthen,Dawei-Hteekhee mawtaw lam cung ah SAC rallamsial Kah lah Yah – 273 phu le ဗိုလ်အယ်ခွီး nih a hruai mi Sakasaw(ဆာကဆော )brigade,PDF phu fonh kar nizaan September 6 ah kahdohnk a chuak i SAC ralkap lei in 10 leng an thi i hriamnam pawl an lak khawh tiah theih a si.
Cu kahdohnak ah SAC ralkap 10 leng an thi tiah PDF lei news nih a chim i SAC ralkap ခလရ-၂၇၃ phu nih an i tlaih mi pistol meithel 1,MA phun meithel 4,le zen,kuan pawl cu PDF phu fonh nih an lak khawh.
ခလရ-၂၇၃ cu Kanpauk khua ah a um mi an si i ကမ်းရိုးတန်းဒေသတိုင်းဌာနချုပ် kuttang ah a um mi battalion pakhat a si.
Cu Dawei-Hteekhee lam cu SAC ralkap nih rallamsial ding an i timh caah ဆာကဆော brigade le Dawei-PDF nih cu lam cu thlakhat chung an khar i zing sml 6 in zaan sml 6 tiang kal lo ding tiah mipi pawl cu thawng an thanh hna.(Crd.Khit Thit Media)

Vangteh khua Pa Zam Zen Pau (Guite) leh S/m Kyi Kyi Win (SAT) te sung panin 7.6.1991 kumin kalemyo ah suak hi. Sanggam laizom neilo tanu tang khat ahi hi. Primary SMS No(4), Middle & High SHS No(3) Tahan hi a, 2006-2007 sang kumin tan 10 All-D tawh zo hi. Myanmar-75, English-77, Maths-89, Chemistry-84, Physics-80, Biology-79 matgawm 484 hi. Falam khuapi cu ruah tamtuk a sur peng ruangah Tlanglo sang lam chak lei cu lei a nem dih caah Lung tum pi cu a ril i October ni 23 zingka ah Habakuk te in cu rawk pet in a den tiah theih asi. Apoi taktak. Thawngpang hi Vapual Auaw sin in kan theih mi asi i an mah nih an ttial ning tein fiang fai tein a tanglei ah kan vun langhter lai.
VAPUAL AUAW:
Ruah sur ringring ruangah Falam khawpi tlanglo veng bochuk zin tlunih lungto cu leinem tuk ah a ril ih October 23 zingah U Habakuk ih Inn a den siat thu theih a si.
Lungto tum zet ril cun Tlanglo veng bochuk zan sir ih Inn a deng ih coksa sungah a lut. Lungto in Inn a den ngah ruangah phar, zial le thildang neuhneuh a siat phah. Cumi lungto cu Falam meitat le ralkap pawl in inn sung in an la suak. Tuitum hi lungto in Inn a den veikhatnak a silo ih kan dung October 3 zinglam khalah lungto ril in tuitum ih Inn thotho a rak deng zo. Cumi ruangah sangkapi , luanglu , zial le thildang neuhneuh a rak siat.
Tui tum lungto ril in Inn a deng cu vei hnihnak a si ih inn sungah minung an rak um lo ih minung hliamhma tuar ,siatsuah aw le thi an um lo tiah theih a si. Hmaisa sawn lungto ril ih Inn den ngah ruangah sungkhat an rak fin hrih.( IPRD )
Source: VAPUAL AU AW

iamlo manin Filipi Pawlpui songah rem dunlohnak um tiin, a cungah ngaanzo ising. Thinlung hmudun thiamlo fangin remdunlo hnak suak ai, rem dunlo fangin pawlkom (or) Pawlpui songah anghnak khai um thillo i. ng, ikhalselai harsa tawk taktak caah ah nundan thiam ing tidun tuh heh thil harsa ngai i.

Stephen Paddock, kum 64 tarpa nih Las Vegas khuapi thahnawnnak a tuahmi cu FBI le palik pawl hna zong nih a ruang an thei kho lo.
ISIS ralhrang pawl nih caantha an vun i lak zau ve le kanmah minung a si, a luan ciami thla zeimawzah ahkhan Muslim biaknak ah ai thlengmi si tiah an hung ti len ve. Nain, FBI pawl nih an zum hna lo.
Tarpa hi rak tlai manh hna sehlaw cu a tuahmi thahnawnnak kong hi theih a si hnga nain, tlaih manh a si hlan ah amah tein a nunnak a lak caah a kong theih khawh a si ti l
... 
 an dothlat tikah Philippines ram i phaisa ting 1 (US $100,000) a kuat tami an hmuh. Cu caah FBI le nawlngeitu pawl hna nihcun Stephen Paddock nih nupi ah aa tuahmi Ms Marilou Danley, kum 62 a simi Philippines rammi tarnu cu biahalnak tuah an duh ngaingai.
A si nain, Ms Marilou Danley cu Philippines ram caan in Cawnnihnih ni zan ah Philippines airlines in US ah aa rak i thawh tiah chirchanh pakhat nih a langhter. The New York Times nihcun a phan cang tiah an langhter ve.
Biafiang hal dingin a ra
...
u pawl hna khi an theih duhmi kong cu tlamtling in Ms Marilou Danley nih hin a chim thlu kho hna hnga maw timi cu ruah awk a um ve. Biahalnak cu a lang rih lo.
Ms Danley cu Philippines rammi a si i, Australia Passport aa tlaihmi a si tiah theih a si. Sept 15 ah Manila a phan, cun Sept 22 ah Hong Kong, cun Hong Kong in Sept 25 ah Manila a phan than tiah Immigration nih phungning tein an langhter caah a nih cu mah thahnawnnak kong he pehtlaiin lunghrinh ding a um lo tiah palik nih an langhter.

Pu Lalrinzuala Chawngthu chuan, sorkar kum kal meka Mizoram budget Rs. vbc. 9672.64 a\anga NEDP hnuaiah Rs. vbc 100 leh State Road Fund atana Rs. vbc 50 dah chu hetiang kawng thawm that lehna tur a nih laia cheng khat mah he kawng siam nana hman tura ruahman ni ve lo chu a lungchhiatthlak hle a ni, a ti a. Kalay-Tamu Motor Lampi Cu Zarhkhat Chung Umkal Rih Lo Dingin PDF Nih Ralrin Peknak Cathanh An Chuah
Kalay-Tamu motor lampi cu nizan November 20 thawk in zarhkhat chung umkal rih lo dingin People’s Defence Force (Kalay) nih ralrin peknak cathanh an chuah tiah theih a si.
Kalaymyo ah SAC ralkap he kahdohnak a zual ngai caah Tamu motor lampi ah mizeihmanh umkal rih lo dingin Kalay Peng PDF in ṭuanvo ngeitu pakhat nih a chim.
“Kalaymyo khua chungah SAC ralkap he kan i pehtlaih ning a ṭhat lo tuk caah Kalay-Tamu motor lampi cu, November 20 thawk in a hohmanh umkal khawh a si ti lai lo. Nawl kan chuahmi nan zulh lo i, harnak pakhat khat nan ton ahcun a herh ning in ṭuanvo kan in lak hna lai, tiah Kalay PDF nih cathanh an chuah.
Kalay-Tamu motor lampi cu a luancia November 13-19 tiang umkal an rak kham i, SAC ralkap nih an hriamnam hna cu tualchung mi motor 14 hmangin India le Myanmar rammi lei Hto Ma in Kalay khua chungah luhpi an timh, tiah PDF Battalion 3 in ṭuanvo ngeitu nih a chim.
India ram in SAC ralkap hriamnam luhpi dingah Kalay-Tamu lampi hman an timh caah PDF ṭangṭi phu hna nih kham ding in an bawh hna, tiah theih a si. Credit-Thechinpost

Hi bomb puahnak a tawlreltu cu al-Qaeda ralhrang Jamal al-Badawi a si, US ralkap nih thah ding an kawl lengmang i atu lawng ah an thah khawh. Vanlawng bomb in an thuat i a nunnak a liam hi a si.
Kan ram caah nunnak a pemi le hliamhma a hmumi pa raltha hna an phu kan hlam khawh cang hna, Badawi cu US ralkap nih an thah khawh cang tiah President Trump nih ai lawmhnak a phuan.

Mizorama ni 100 inhlawhna kalpui
dan Puducherry-in rawn zirchiang
Mizoramin MNREGA scheme-a kalpui dan zirchiang tura lokal Puducherry DRDA minister AK Sai J Saravanan Kumar leh a team-te chuan Nilaini khan Rural Development minister Lalruatkima leh department hotu dangte an kawm.
Minister Lalruatkima chuan Mizoramin hlawhtling taka MGNREGA scheme-a kalpui theih chhan chu deparment thawktute inpekna, thawhrimna leh beneficiary-te atanga tawiawmna tha a awm vang nia sawiin, rethei leh khawsak harsa zawkte tanpui chu sawrkar thil tum lian ber pakhat a nih avangin MGNREGA chu uluk, felfai leh dik taka kalpui a ni tih a sawi. Mizoram chu India ramah pawh MGNREGA kalpui tha ber zing ami a nih thu leh lawmman pawh an lo lak fo tawh thu a sawi a ni.
Puducherry minister chuan Mizoramin tha taka MGNREGA scheme a kalpui thei leh ‘100% target achievement’ a nei thei chu RD minister thawhrimna leh inpekna a ni tiin, Mizoram kalpui dan tha chu an state-a hman ve theih nan theihtawp a chhuah tur thu a sawi.
Zirhona atang a alan danin tunah hian MGNREGA chu Mizoram khua (gram panchayat) 866-ah kalpui mek a ni a, job card 214384 pek chhuah tawh niin, MGNREGA hnuaia inhlawh thin mi 229685 an awm mek. MGNREGA hnuaiah hna 18945 tan tawhin, heng zinga hna 13887 chu zawh a ni tawh a, hnathawh zawh tawh zat hi zaa 73.3 a ni.

Zogam hi British sawrkar in kum 1895 daih atang tawh in a lo awp a. Chung hunlai chuan British in ram tamtak an awp(colonised) a ni. Nitla seng loa roreltu ti hial khawpa khawvel hriat lar a ni. Kum 1914-1919 chhung khan England leh Germany an indo a, khawvel indopui pakhatna tia hriat a ni bawk. England lam chu tamtak thi in tangka pawh 900 million pound lai an hloh a ni. England chu France nen inkawpin an awp ram atangin tanpuina an dil hlawm a. Heng ram atangte hian Kuli tur an la a ni: 1.Egy
... 
i(Labour Corps) atana tih an ni. Tedim ah thla thum chhung hnathawh dan tur an zirtir hmasa phawt a. Chuan May 27, 1917 ah Tedim chhuahsan in France an pan ta a ni.

1917May 28: ah Dimlo atangin Thaangpi-ah an riak.
1917May 30: Tulsuk atanginin Kawlpi-ah an riak.

1917 June 8: Myanyan at

1917 August 6: Toronto atangin train in an chhuak leh
1917 August 14: France Khawpui Marselles an thleng
1917 August 24: Marselles atangin train in an chhuak leh

Vawiin hian Serchhip District Urban Development Officer (DUDO) thar Pi Vanthangpuii chuan Pu Beitlotha Nohro, MCS, DLAO leh UD&PA Department hnuaia Sanitation Officer hna lo chelh kawp mektu hnen atangin Charge a la fel a. Vawiin atang chuan Serchhip in UD&PA District Office hran leh Officer thar (DUDO) kan nei ta a ni.
Tin, DUDO Serchhip hian Office Building thar pawh luah nghalin, Serchhip Town Hall floor hnuai, Venglai Area-ah an insuan lut nghal bawk a. Anmahni dawr duh tan an Office tharah hian dawr theih an ni anga, UD&PA District Officer dawrna thil reng reng pawh District Urban Development Officer (DUDO) thar Pi Vanthangpuii hminga tih zel tur a ni tawh ang.

September ni 10 sem an tum 2024 MTV Video Music Awards chu US vice president Kamala Harris leh president hlui Donald Trump te Presidential debate neih hun tur nen a innan avangin MTV VMA hi September ni 11-ah an sawn ta a, award semnaa perform tur a thawh khatna puang nghalin Sabrina Carpenter, Camila Cabella, Chappell Roan, GloRilla leh Rauw Alejandro te hming an tlar nghal dal e.
Camila Cabella hi MTV VMA stage-ah tum thum a perform-na tur a ni dawn ta a, midang- Sabrina, Chappell Roan, GloRilla leh Rauw Alejandro te tan chuan he stage-a an vawi khat perform-na tur theuh a ni ve thung. Sabrina hi nikum MTV VMA pre-show-ah khan a lo inlan tawh a, nikuma pre-show a inlan a, kumina main show-a inlan leh nghal thei chu Sabrina hi kum khat chhungin a lar chak hle tihna a ni thei ang.
Heng perform tur an puan hmasak panga te hi nomination-ah pawh an lang vek a, Sabrina Carpenter hian nomination paruk neiin, GloRilla hian pathum a nei a, Roan leh Alejandro ten pahnih ve ve neiin, Camila Cabello-i’n nomination pakhat a nei bawk.
Kumin MTV VMA nomination-ah hian Taylor Swift a langsar ber a, nomination 10 a nei a, Post Malone-a’n nomination pakua neiin a dawt a, Ariana Grande, Eminem leh Sabrina Carpenter ten paruk theuh neiin, Megan Thee Stallion leh SZA ten panga ve ve an nei a, LISA, Olivia Rodrigo leh Teddy Swims ten pali theuh an nei bawk.

Serchhip-ah MNF zawm thar mi 45 lawmluh an ni
He hunah hian MNF Adviser J. Mal-sawmzuala Vanchhawng chuan MNF party chu dinna nghet tak leh thuthlung nghet tak nei anih avangin mi zawng zawng tan belhtlak a ni tih sawiin, Party mipuite chu an thil tih apiang mipuite tana rawngbawlna pawimawh a ni tih vawng reng turin a chah a, mi dangte elsenna leh diriamna ang chi laka inthiarfihlim tura chah bawkin, hetih rual hian thudik tluantling lo hmanga MNF sawrkar beihna a nasat avangin zawldawh tak leh thuhnuairawlh tak chunga thu dik zawk sawi-fiah thin tur leh sawrkar hmalakna te midangte hrilhfiah kawngah tan la thar turin a chah a ni.
Hei bakah hian Mizoram in harsatna a tawh apianga tawngtai sak thintu leh a tul apianga penchhuak thin Kohhran ho kan nei te, sawrkar hmalakna nghet taka thlawp tlat thin NGO leh zirlai pawl kan neite chu kan vanneih bik zia mipuiten kan chhut nawn fo a that thu MNF Adviser chuan a sawi bawk.

Remna ni lawmna pualin Essay inziahsiakna nei
Serchhip DC Office, Serchhip District Education Officer (DEO) Office leh Samagra Ser-chhip DPC Office buatsaiha Govt. Higher Secondary School-a Essay inziahsiakna ah hian thupui atan ‘Political History of Mizoram 1947 (Post Independence) to 1987 (Mizoram Statehood)’ tih hman niin Serchhip District chhunga Higher Secondary School pakua (9) atangin zirlai 22 an tel a. Serchhip SDEO leh Samagra-a Addl. DPC Vanlalmuka chuan hmanpuiin he intihsiakna a tit
... 
imin vek khan chawhnu lamah Serchhip District Superintendent of Police (SP) Office leh Education Department tangkawp buatsaihin High School leh Higher Secondary School zirlai nau-pangte tan a hmun ngai ah ruihhlo dona hmalakna chikhat atan ‘Ruihhlo Thalaite hmelma’ tih thupui ah hmangin Essay inziahsiakna neih chhunzawm a ni a. He hun hi Serchhip SDPO Kaste Romal-sawma chuan kaihruaiin Ruihhlo in nasa takin kan ram a run a. A bikin thalai ten an ti nasa a, ruihhlo chu thalaite hmelma a nih thu a
...
ohna an lantir nana intihsiakna a an tel chu lawmawm a tih thu a sawi a. Tunlaiin Mizo thalai tam tak ruihhlo bawih-ah an tang mek tih sawiin, Mizoram hma hun, kan nakin hun hi thalaite kutah a awm avangin ruihhlo lakah kan in thiarfihlim a tul thu a sawi a. Tihdamna awmlo natna khirh tak HIV/AIDS thlentu anih bawk avangin ruihhlo laka fihlim turin zirlai kalkhawmte a chah bawk a ni. Heng Essay inziahsiakna a lawmman te hi tun thla ni 30-a Remna ni lawmna ah sem a ni ang.

Serchhip District Hospital chuan thla kalta, December 2019 chhung khan pawl leh mimal 32 zet te hnen atangin Poor Fund an dawng a, heng bakah hian thawktute leh damlote ei leh in tur thahnem tak an dawng bawk.
Serchhip District Hospital hotute hnen atanga thu kan dawn danin Krismas leh Kumthar vuakvet kan hman zawh takah khan Serchhip District Hospital hian pawl leh mimal hrang hrang 32 te hnen atangin Poor Fund hi an dawng a, kumdang zawng aiin Poor Fund hi an dawng tha tih sawiin nitin dawng anga chhut theih an ni a. A bik takin Krismas thlen dawn karah phei chuan Poor Fund hi an dawng tha hle a ni.
Thudawn danin Krismas leh Kumthar vuakvet-a Serchhip District Hospital in Poor Fund a dawn zawng zawng hi Rs. 1,56,293/- zet niin sawrkar Department atanga pe zingah PHE leh Vety Department-a Staff Welfare telin Koh-hran hming-a pe pawl 9 an awm a, tlawmngai pawl (YMA, MHIP etc) hminga pe pahnih awmin pawl dang hminga pe 6 an awm a. Mimal a Poor Fund pe mi 14 an awm bawk a ni. Heng bakah hian thawktute leh damlo te ei leh in atan pawl leh mimal 10 zetin pawisafai leh eitur te an pe bawk a ni.

Saturday, July 4, 2009

TCP-Online| 2018 October 2| Global Chin (Falam) Organization -GCO tawlrelnak in Lailun ah hlanlio thilri le pipu hna rorah vialte chiahnak ding caah (Museum) inn sak an i tim tiah theih a si.
Hi hmun cu Ekah (2) tluk a kau mi hmun a si i hlanlio thil le ri, hlan lio pi le pu hna an rorah vial te cu khomh in hi hmun ah chiah ding an timh. Hi inn cu tha ngai in sak an timh i a hmunhma zong an kulh cang. Mah inn (Museum) cu tukum chungah a lam cawh le hmaikum ah rian domh i 2020 kum chungah a voi hninhnak Ruun Inn Tlun kum puai he peh in hunnak tuah te ding in timhtuahnak an ngei.
“Avoi khatnak Ruun Inn Tlun puai tuah lio ah hi inn (museum) saknak ding caah tiin sing 500 rak chiah cia a si. Cunak in hi rian hi thok a si. Hi inn (Museum) cu khuaza ramkip um Falam mi pawl i bawm in sak dingmi a si.” tiah Museum inn saknak tawlrel tu Pu Dar Lian Uk nih a chim.
Hi inn (Museum) chungah chiah ding in hlan lio thilri manfak mi pawl le a dangdang thilri phun pawl zong hi inn ah chiah a duh ve mi hna nih Chinland Herald Editor Salai Nhgepi, Pu Dar Lian Uk le Falam khuanu/pa houtu Pu Hrang Lawm Thang sin ah pehtlaihnak zong tuah i chiah khawh a si tiah kan theih.
(Ref: CH)

A hmanpuitu Central YMA President Pu Vanlalruata chuan, Mizo hnam chu kiltin a\angin tichhiat tumin nekin a awm mek niin a sawi a, Chakma ten tun hmain Mizo te an nek ngam lo tih sawiin, tunah chuan \antu an nei nia an inhriat avangin an huangtau ta hle a, Mizo mipui te \anho a ngai zual ta hle a ni a ti. Pu Vanlalruata chuan, Mizo hnam chu hnam tlem te, \hendarh tham loh a ni tih sawiin, hnam bil ham\hatna tur zawnga hmalak pawh thil tih chi a ni lo a, Mizoah lungawi taka awm mai chu zo hnahthlak zawng zawngte tih tur a ni a ti a, ruihhlo lakah \halaite an fihlim thiehna turin nunkawng dika hruai kawngah \anlak a ngai a ni a ti.
Inkhawm hi Diamond Jubilee Celebration Chairman Pu H Lalbiakmawia’n a kaihruai a, Jubilee Cake an zai a, hruaitu hlui an chawimawi bakah Jubilee puala Souvenir buatsaih chu an Adviser Pu H Vanlalruata’n a tlangzarh a, malzai leh Jubilee zaipawl te ngaihthlak a ni. Jubilee pual hian khawtlang huapin a thlawna inentirna Free Clinic te, thisen pek runpui te leh intihhlimna chi hrang hrangte an lo buatsaih tawh a ni. Republic Veng YMA hi kum 1958 khan din a ni a, tun dinhmunah member 2248 an awm a ni.

HIHHAKSAT A OM
Taangteel: Na dan thusehte ka ziltheihna dinga hihhaksat a ka om ahoih hi (Sam 119:71).
Haksatna leh gentheihna i tuah hun chiang in, lungkham a vangtah tuam kisakna neih a baihlam mahmah hi. Himahleh hiai banga haksatna, lungngaihna i tuah hunte tuh Toupa Pathian toh hon kinaihsaktu ana hi thei ua, a hoih ahi chi a ilak zel ding uh ahi. Nuamsa leh lungmuang a i om hun chiang in Pathian lam leng phawk banlou a, a kianga thum ding leng peih khollouh baihlam tak ahi a, huai tuh thil hoihlou ahi. Sam gelhtu in tuh Toupa dan thusehte manphatna tamtak hon gelhte laka khat tuh hihhaksat a om a hoihna om ahi, chih ahi. Mihing lam a lam-etna a bei nungin leng gingtu, Pathian' tate adingin mitnauta banga hon en a, akiang i naih hunhun a honna dawng thei gige Toupa neih kaan a nuam zaw omlou ahi.
Ngaihtuah ding: Haksatna ka tuah hun a ka zilkhiak bang ahia?

Puai a kai kho mi Phway Phway nih Facebook cung ah “Wild Rose dihin White Rose keimah ka racang. Nizaan Taung Gyee D&C Grand Opening puai ah kan i nuam tuk.. Thanks for your time & love Taung Gyee… Big Congrats “D & C”!!” tiah a rak tial. Actress Phway Phway i a hruk mi a thuam rangmi he a dawhtuk mi a hmanthlak pawl cu a tanglei ah kan rak langhter.

Covid-19 natsia le ralkap pawlin Kalaymyo ramsung an nuai ciamco hnuah zanṭim laiah rukru an hrang zet ti theih a si. Kalaymyo ramsung ah zan vahsuah siang lo thu an phuang zo nan rukru cu an tam zet.
Rukru pawlin innsungsang thilri le lamzinkap ih meisa hri an ru ṭheu. July 27 zinglam kau nazi 1:00 hrawngah zo ti theih loin Kalaymyo, Tat Oo Thida vengih meisa hrih an ruk lai cu CCTV in arak zuk ngah.
Cumi hnuah Bogyoke lamzin, District Office kiangih um inn 5 ih meisa hri khal an ruksak. Rukru pawl ih cangvaih caan hi zanṭim lai a si ruangah mipi in an theithei lo.
Tat Oo Thida vengsung ih meisa hri an ruksak mi in “Tulai Kalaymyo sungah meisa hri ru an tam zet, mizan July 27 zan nazi 1:00 ah rukru 2 in kan meisa hri an ruk lai cu CCTV in arak zuk ngah. Anmah cu kan kai ngah lo, an ruk mi kan inn ta meisa hri cu pi 300 a si” a ti.
An rukmi meisa hri pawl cu meisa hri ṭha pawl a si ih a man khal a khung zet, cun rukru pawl ih cangvaihdan an zoh tikah meisa hri rukdan khal an thiam zet. Veng dang khalin thilhlo le meisa hri ruksak tong an rak um hnuaihni zo.
