Hmelthat nan pudina
Pudina hi taksa hrisel nan a that dan kan rawn tarlang fo tawh a, tun tum chu hmelthat nana a thatna hrang hrang Times of India health section-in an tarlan te kan rawn chhuah chhawng e.
1. Vun a ti-êng thei. Pudina hian a vun a tihahdamin, a tiharh thar thei a, chu chuan vun-a thil dum neuh neuh awm te a tirehin, vun a tilang êng lehzual thei.
2. Vun tinaupangtu tha tak a ni. Pudina hian vuna thisen luang vel a tichakin, vun a tihnawng a, chu chuan vun a timarin a tihrisel thin a, vun upa chak tur vengin, kum upa avanga vuna inrin neuh neuh leh chuar hma tur te a veng thei.
3. Pudina-ah hian antioxidant a tam a, chu chuan kan taksa a free radical a bei let a, chu chu vun hriselna leh hmelthatna a ni.
4. Arngneng enkawl nan a tha. Pudina rawt sawm la, rose water tlem pawlh la, besan tlem pawlhin tidiak la, chu chu hmaiah hnawih la, minute 30 vel i chiah hnuah tuisikin i phihfai leh mai dawn nia.
5. I vun a khawro thin em? Pudina rawt sawm la, a tui sawr la, chu chu i vunah hnawih la, moisturiser tha tak a ni.
6. Vun tifaitu tha tak a ni. Pudina rawt sawm la, a tui sawr la, oatmeal thirfiante khat vel nen chawhpawlh la, chu chu i hmaiah hnawih la, minute 10-15 vel chiah la, i phih fai leh mai dawn nia. Hei hian vuna cell thi tawh te a tifai thei.
7. Toner tha tak a ni. Pudina chu chhum la, a tui thli chhuakin tidai la, chu chu toner angin i hmang tawh mai dawn a ni. Nitin a tui chu i vunah te i phuh deuh thet thet ang a, i vun a ti-fresh-in a tiêng thei ang.

Hmeichhe hruaitute training
Aizawl; Mizoram Synod hnuaia Central Kohhran Hmeichhe Committee member-te pualin Leadership Training & Retreat chu Nilaini zan leh Ningani nileng khan Synod Conference Centre-ah neih a ni.
Nilaini zanah hian Sermon Inkhawm neih a ni a, Rev. Lianhmingthanga Sailo, Synod Secretary (Sr.)-in thuchah a sawi a, tawngtairualna hun hman a ni bawk. Inkhawm banah hian inhmelhriattirna leh sharing hun hman zui a ni.
Ningani khan zing karah Rev. P.C.Pachhunga, Executive Secretary i/c Kohhran Hmeichhiain hmanpuiin thuchah a sawi a, chawhma lamah Pi H.Lalpianthangi, Central Kohhran Hmeichhe Secretary hovin ‘Central Committee-te rawngbawl dan kalphung inhriattirna leh sawihona’ neih a ni a, chawhnu lamah Upa R.Lalmalsawma, PRESCOM Manager hovin ‘Leadership Training & Sawihona’ neih leh a ni a, zanah ‘Sum Vawn Dan’ tih thupui Tv. Zaihmingthanga, Accountant, Synod Office-in a zirpui bawk.
Kohhran Hmeichhia Central Committee hian kum 1993 atang khan term thar apiangin Leadership Training leh Retreat hi an nei thin a. Kum 2017-2019 hruaitute pualin tun tumah hian an nei ve leh a ni.

Aizawl, August 17, 2018
Lunglei South bial khaw hrang hrang tlawh mektu, Congress Legislature Party (CLP) Treasurer leh Minister ni bawk, Zodintluanga chuan Thualthu-a vantlang inkhawm neihnaah thu sawiin tuna eptu MLA ni lai mekte chu kum 2018 inthlanah tling nawn tur an awm tawh loh thu a sawi.
Aizawl West II bial chungchang sawiin, “Kum 2008 inthlanah party mala dingin MNF 3-na an ni a, PC candidate Brig . Sailo hneh taka tlingin kum 2013-ah MNF leh MPC chu thawkhovin Congress 
... 
 lo va, he bialah pawh hian MNF MLA ni lai tan hian tlin leh theihna tur a awm lo,” CLP Treasurer chuan a ti bawk.
Congress Minister chuan Tuikum bialah pawh MNF leh MPC tangkawp khan Congress party block chhunga buaina awm chungin vote 14 chauhvin chakna a chang tih sawiin, “An mal din phei chuan chance an nei lo nasa hle dawn a ni,” a ti bawk.
Zodintluanga chuan Congress party chu ram pumah nasa takin hma sawn chho zelin MNF hun laia tihchhiat tawh development project siam that leh tam tak chu
...
i rethei hlamchhiah miah lo sorkar a nih vang a ni,” tiin mi rethei thil petu chuan Pathian a puktir thu a sawi.
“An SEDP hi anmahni MNF takngial pawh hian an zuar peih tawh lo a, an ring lo reng reng a ni,” PC Lalthanliana chuan a ti bawk.
Zodintluanga, P.C.Lalthanliana leh Lunglei District Congress Committee hruaitute hian S.Laldingliana bial, Lunglei South khaw hrang hrang Thaizawl/Bualte, Thualthu, Tawipui North, Tawipui South leh Thingfal te an tlawh a, vantlang inkhawm an neihpui vek a ni.
